I love everything about especially the slider camera, there are 2 things that I do not like. If you are in a video chat (drop in) if you navigate the screen while in the chat you can’t go back to video and the auto dimmer is not the best I’m always adjusting myself

Enjoying it much better than my 4 Echo dots! Love that I can just ask Alexa to show me the front door, when Ring doorbell sounds. Just a bit confused how to keep the clock display on at all times as the default screen. Otherwise, am very happy with the Echo Show 5.

reviews.reviewTitle: Better than expected, but jury’s still out
reviews.reviewText: This is our first experience with the tech. I’m favorably impressed for now, but will wait and see for my final judgment. Voice recognition is good, but sometimes it’s frustrating trying to get Alexa to respond to commands. Guess we have to learn how to talk to her.

Love the Echo 5. Got it to replace my spot and this is far superior.

For a single speaker it has great sound. I prefer the clock face over the rotating photos.

The screen looks good also and just a nice size to be beside the bed and used as a smart alarm clock

It acts wonky sometimes, and has randomly disconnected from our network when everything else is still on. Love the closed captioning feature and how we can cover the camera. I wish Spot had these features. Over all pretty pleased with this purchase. Voice recognition needs work still.

What can I say about my echo? I enjoyed the Echo Dot, but when I received the echo show on prime day for that amazing price I was further impressed. My daughter loves to utilize the playlist for her nursery rhymes and songs. She even watches sesame street in the kitchen while I'm cooking. The sound is great and I look forward to purchasing another one soon.

reviews.reviewTitle: Remember to use her name when asking for her help!
reviews.reviewText: I got this Echo to put in my kitchen, so that I could watch the videos on how to make recipes as I cooked. I love it! As I love all my Echo devices. They are all helpful, sound friendly, and often have good suggestions on how to deal with problems that may arise.

Everything works great except using our Amazon Blink cam system to work with it. Sometimes it works where you can see video and sometimes no connection. Not sure which product is the issue, but there is an issue with these products working together as advertised....

reviews.reviewTitle: DON'T GET HOPING FOR AUDIO PLAYBACK
reviews.reviewText:
Don't get this thinking you want to hear Alexa speak to you or have music playback or use drop in or calls. The sound quality is TERRIBLE. I've adjusted volume, adjusted EQ, doesn't matter. Sound is trash. I upgraded on a trade in from an echo Dot and I regret losing the echo Dot.

Otherwise, it's a great size, video is nice trade from the Dot. But the speaker sucks.

So I have mixed emotions about it, the sound quality is awesome. I love the bright screen. Thr only thing I don’t like is that coming from a google home to the echo show 5 the show doesn’t answer questions as good as the google home and most of the time I have to yell to get a responses

reviews.reviewTitle: Serviceable device, but privacy concerns remain
reviews.reviewText:
Has served us well enough so far, especially with regards to: playing local radio, playing themed playlists, and following recipes hands-free.

We also appreciate that the built-in camera has a cover, however said cover is white and the device will wake immediately when we walk by it, suggesting news stories, etc. If privacy is a concern, definitely replace or supplement the flimsy cover provided in-device.

Honestly was looking for a new "smart alarm clock" and this thing is perfect for the job. Has great voice recognition sometimes I notice that far away it tends not to pick up my voice as well. Pictures on the alarm are in great quality and I feel for the price its perfect.

reviews.reviewTitle: Replaced all my 1st gen and 2nd gen Echos
reviews.reviewText: I've been a big Echo fan for years. The introduction of this device allowed me to replace my 1st gen Echo Shows and most of my 2nd gen Echos. Having a device with a screen is a much improved experience. The sound quality is great. The options are well designed. I'm very pleased with the performance.

reviews.reviewTitle: Speaker is bad, voice recognition is sub par compared to Echo
reviews.reviewText: The worst speaker compared the Echo and even dot. Volume control is also not up to the mark compared to Echo. The screen is worth having to see the front door etc. But I wish had a good speaker. I connected an aux to simple BT speaker we had. But I wish its USB could charge the speaker.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love the compact size and the great speakers
reviews.reviewText: Love the compact size and the great speakers. The sound is pretty good for such a small size. As for motion detection? I have not heard/used that function. I'll have to look in to it further since you are asking about the feature. Otherwise great for my desk
Like it’s big brother, the Echo Show 5 is perfect for my work desktop to keep me informed on news, music and sports along with automating my office space.

reviews.reviewTitle: Got on amazon Prime for 50 bucks. Can not beat it
reviews.reviewText: Got this in my vacation house bedroom great for music and controlling my fire stick. A d great for alarm and dont need a clock. It has one.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great screen for viewing security cameras and two way talking.
reviews.reviewText: I got it to replace one of my 1st generation dots I was still using. I've placed it in the living room so I can view my ring doorbell camera. Just the right size for the end table I set it on. Also got one for the bedroom for an alarm clock. Both are great!
Great Unit. Better screen and sound than the Spot. Physical Camera slide cover, so it's fine to use in the bedroom.
Excellent!!

We love being Alexafied...we check our home temperature upstairs and down. We use this model in my mother's room, which is upstairs. I'm able to "drop in" on her before walking the stairs to see if she needs anything. When she does need something she can drop in where we have other Alexa devices and let us know she needs assistance. Great to communicate with inside the house and in the outside world...

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo Show 5 -Fun and easy to use and setup
reviews.reviewText: Once I downloaded the app on my phone the Echo started to do what I wanted it to do. Alexa app can control TV and answer my cell phone calls. play my music, set alarms and now I feel like a have a personal assistant. If she can only cook dinner... well she does have good recipes. Price was great on Prime day!

I dislike that I was not alerted to the fact that the speakers of the Echo 5 are located at the bottom of the device, I was allowed to purchase an non-Amazon stand for my new device that BLOCKS the speakers therefore producing a very tinny sound to voice and obliterates musical reproduction. I would have appreciated being notified in advance as to the benefit of using the Amazon stand designed for this particular device. As for Alexa integration.....there was no problem, I requested that my device be bused as opposed to air freighted. And, as for Motion detection, I’m not aware of motion being one of Alexa’s skills.

I am very happy with this device, I play my music thru it, the speaker is good, although for the most part I connect it via Bluetooth to my soundbar. It's everything it says it is. The display is good, nice quality product, and Alexa can do so many things. Great purchase.

Great gadget. Does everything all my other Alexa’s do. Got a great price. Only reason 4 stars, I wish I would turn black out after 15 minutes not using. It keeps going thru news and stuff. Trying to save energy so I just unplug when I’m not home/in that room.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for nightstand, not sure where else.
reviews.reviewText: Great little addition to the nightstand, clock is perfect at night and easy to ask for some music to fall asleep by and alarm to wake up to. Not using the camera at all tho and not sure I'd use it anywhere else in house besides nightstand. Maybe a small studio kitchen counter?

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo 5 poor sound and stand should be included.
reviews.reviewText: I use the Echo 5 as a bedroom alarm clock and it meets expectations. What I don't like is the poor speaker sound due to the speaker location. Speaker should have been located on the back like the Echo 2nd Gen. I also don't like that you have to pay extra for the Echo 5 stand which is overpriced.

I got this on Amazon Prime and I really love it. It works as a smart clock and I love the feature to run routines. I don’t know anyone who uses Skype so I can’t speak to that feature but overall it was a great PRIME DAY deal. Even my skeptical husband loves it.

I love having my Echo Show 5 on my desk. It's easy to video chat with friends or just play music with the lyrics on screen. Sometimes a recipe or news article pops up that I didn't even know I wanted to learn more about. Great addition to the Echo/Alexa family.

I received this as a gift, so I didn't know much about it initially. It works well for video calling the biggest issue I see is the voice recognition when it comes to messages. I can't seem to edit before sending so if my message isn't interpreted correctly the message goes over wrong. I haven't used it much aside from listening to music, which I love since I was able to hook up my boss speaker to it.

Great to have a screen paired with Alexa functionality. All smart home control is easily accessed as are videos and other things you often use. I've been using this as an alarm clock and it works great at dimming down in that use. Highly recommend for that use.
Really slick product, use it on the road as an alarm clock / news conduit. Good size, decent speaker quality.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's difficult if you don't know the alexa Language.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this so i could use the Blink series of security cameras. It works but the notifications aren't what i had expected. I thought there would be some sort of sound or alarm when motion is detected from the camera, there isn't. So I give it a 3Star rating...ehhh
It was a little smaller than i realized and thst is a good thing because it fits in the only small spot i have available on my desk.

Great addition to Echo and Echo Dot. Some minor difficulty in connecting to Ring doorbell, directions need to be clarified or automated for dummy users like me. Getting video and sound on Echo 5 when the doorbell rings means I don't have to go down the stairs to answer the door!

We purchased the larger show a couple of months ago and have just loved it. We had a winter home in AZ so decided to get this smaller one to take south when we go. Fired it up here and found it just as great as its bigger brother. Really works well with the Ring doorbell and cameras!

Apple Music worked on this device for two days but all of the sudden Alexa is keep saying that she has problem playing Apple Music
I googled this issue and seem like this a common issue with this device

reviews.reviewTitle: Good Sound and Karaoke to boot!
reviews.reviewText:
It's not earth shattering or cutting edge, but it's not trying to be (I don't think) ... if you have Amazon music and fancy a really cool clock in the bedroom ... it's perfect!
I literally use it as clock and in the morning I simply say "... Alexa play Timbaland radio..." and jam out out while I get m s#it together 🤪 .. having that output to add even more sound (simply plug in a separate speaker) is a nice bonus as well (the native sound is bigger and more pleasing than that of Google's comparable offering ... and this is $40 less msrp)

I have three of these around the house with several other Echo devices. I like the new Show-5's, they are small, have a nice easy to use touch display, and work well with the other devices I have. Nice product, reasonable price, and easy to set u and use.

I put it in my kitchen & she helps me cook with recipes. She plays music & she tells me the weather. I can watch Amazon prime when I do my dishes &she also plays music. I don't know anyone else with the same device & so I have not make any calls yet. -Dawn

reviews.reviewTitle: Everything I expected it to be
reviews.reviewText: I bought the Echo Show 5 for my nightstand. Since I already have an Echo Show gen 2, which I have set up to show photos, news, sports, stocks, etc., I liked the idea of having a smaller one which I could use as just an alarm clock and lights in my room, or more if I ever wanted. The Echo Show 5 is everything I expected it to be. I have set the exact time for ambient lighting at night, which is orange in color, and then I lowered the brightness in settings to dim it even more. The Echo Show 5 is a little gem, in my opinion. Best little alarm clock and much more.
I love this! Easy to add reminders! Easy to add an amazon item to my cart! So many things to do with this! Would definitely buy another!

reviews.reviewTitle: Built in privacy - perfect for bedroom
reviews.reviewText: Smaller screen than Gen 1 - but equal or superior by other metrics. The sound is especially good for such a small form factor. I especially appreciate a physical slide that blocks the camera - perfect for a bedroom device or other rooms where privacy is a concern.

I had a echo 1 for two years, I traded it in with the trade in program and during the Prime Days, I got a brand new show and a adjustable stand for 26.00! Yippee!!! Wish I would have bought two, they were on sale for 49.99.
Plays movies, music, turns on my lights, love it!

I have bought all the echoes to date. Other than the newest full size show this show is AMAZING!!! Perfect size for a desk! I bought 2 and use them daily. GREAT size. Lets bring on some more overall features ALEXA?! Its been a minute for a major feature update.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice screen - default mode it goes to sleep
reviews.reviewText: I upgraded from an Echo spot. After a research of the settings was finally able to get it out of sleep mode and bright enough to see from a distance. It has a nice screen size and is easily view able on bright setting. Default mode should be set so that it does not go into sleepy mode.

We bought this item to use with our Blink cameras. It will show camera views but we were disappointed that it does not give notifications from the cameras. I am the only person with a smart phone, my hubby does not want one, so if I am gone he has no way to see if anyone is in our yard. It also does not recognize my voice and puts weird things on our shopping list, it recognizes my hubby but I have to yell to get a response.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does everything it promises and more!!!
reviews.reviewText: So, this is my 3rd echo that I’ve bought for my home. The first two were echo 2nd generation. And, they work well. But, in my opinion this “echo show” does so, so, many things. In fact too many too list. And, If I we’re yall. I’d try to purchase atleast two of these for home n office. Atleast for video use. Anyway, LOVE, LOVE, this product. It really is great! 5* product and I would def recommend!!!!!!!!!!!
Use it in my Bedroom, Great for Alarm, Lights, Music, Weather, screen is small but great for what I need.

I love this thing!! I didn’t utilise the Echo Dot in the way I do the Echo Show. I love seeing reminders from my calendar, I love seeing the tips, watching little news stories as I do dishes at the sink, it’s become a mini entertainment center and has been fully integrated with my other devices (thermostat, doorbell, video cameras, smart outlets). I love it so much I have two!

This replaced the echo dot and clock radio in the bedroom. Nice display. I followed the tips in the comments and removed the 'helpful' suggestions. I haven't tried watching videos yet. I hope to get another one for the kitchen during a prime day or sale.
I like it alot! Integrates perfectly with my Amazon Tap. Love the alternating display of my selected photos and the sing along lyrics display feature.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works fantastic with a small footprint!
reviews.reviewText: Love the size of this device. Love the smaller screen also. Sound is good for a unit this size. It is very responsive and accurate.

Our family is loving the Echo Show! I bought it on amazon prime day and my kids love it! It is now their favorite "Alexa" in the house. It paired nicely with the RING doorbell I bought (also on prime day) and we love that it shows lyrics when it plays music. When I drop in from my phone we can see each other (like facetime). Great little gadget!

A great addition to our show family. We have the larger echo show in the kitchen and the show 5 in the living room and bedroom. Perfect size for the night stand and end table. Love the communication and drop in features.

Without the stand the front speakers are too close to the surface where it is placed, causing distortion at lower frequencies. This model is very inferior to other echo devices in its ability to hear you. Sitting right next to it I have to directly face it for it to hear my voice.

Not as easy to setup with another Alexa a the network. (actually is a pain). You have to remember to cover the little camera if you are using it as a clock, also you can't really adjust the brightness at night. It's either bright and awake or dark in sleep mode. It gives you the weather and all the Alexa features, such as access to your cameras and such. The screen is small, but it works and is worth the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not satisfied with my purchase at this point. Please help.
reviews.reviewText: Like the music feature. I can listen to whatever genre music I want. I am having trouble controlling some devices in my home. Echo Show only controls a couple of devices that my Echo Dots control. I called and spoke to a representative who, after several minutes trying to help me, said the Echo Show only controls certain brands of smart plugs. This was discouraging. If I can't control more with the Show, I may have to return it. Any further help with this would be greatly appreciated. Also, I cannot pair the Echo Show with my Alexa app on my phone. Is there a procedure for pairing these?

reviews.reviewTitle: can't get echo show 5 to display video.
reviews.reviewText: Why would someone build a product with a camera in it and then not let you use it in home security? They added something called Guard which detects alarms. (Good). then they don't seem to have a way to look at the camera that generates the alarm. Maybe I'm missing something. I would love to hear that it's just me. I'll wait a little and then change review if it is

Sometimes i feel like Alexa hears our conversation. For example: over the holidays my husband and i were in the kitchen planning our holiday meal. Without us calling Alexa, she Immediately turns on and says.. whole foods has lots of deals on holiday foods. Weird.. happend again last week too.

reviews.reviewTitle: I have 3 different echo shows and this one is of great convenience.
reviews.reviewText: It does everything else that the big brother the echo show 2nd generation does, but rather than being big and taking up desk space. This one I place on my desk and use it for many different functions, such as music, alarms, reminders, and a clock.

The Echo Show 5 is a replacement for the Echo Spot. The larger screen provides a better view using Alexa from a Ring Doorbell or Ring Stick Up Camera. Overall, the quality of the Echo Show 5 and video resolution is very good. I would recommend the purchase of the Echo Show 5 stand, because it helps lessen the muffled sound from the speakers by raising the unit about an inch off the table or counter. Ideally, the stand should be included with the purchase, but unfortunately, it needs to be purchased separately.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great device at a fraction of the cost for the full size.
reviews.reviewText: Overall very happy. Voice recognition suffers a little bit when listening to music on the louder volume settings. Would like to see that improve a little bit ideally. The sound is good, especially when you consider the speaker size. I believe they can improve on it a little still though.

I would recommend this. I really haven’t had it long enough to be able too give a strong apps ion ether way. Yet I’m impressed with it so fair . I’m really excited to learn how to utilize it better. I would highly recommend it. For what I’ve seen so far.

this was a huge ease of money. it rarely responds to commands, the screen is like permanently dark for some reason, and it often just cuts out when i’m using it for spotify, which is the main reason i got it. super annoying, really unhappy, don’t recommend.

Being a huge fan of all things Alexa this product is no exception. Absolutely love it! Sound quality is excellent for the size & perfect for the bedroom or office. Thank you Amazon!

Would be great it these Alexa products could be shipped directly to New Zealand :)

The only problem I have with this item is setting it up to my phone..... Other then that it is great for an alarm, quick questions and love the sleeping insomnia relaxation app, works like a charm have 2, Like better then then the dot for pictures. Everyone needs one!

I love the Show...it makes a great bedside alarm. I love the wake-up feature...it gradually brightens near alarm time. I have had issues with voice recognition. Sometimes I feel like I’m screaming at to wake up, but then it reacts to the TV in the next room.

I purchased this little device to have in my bathroom to listen to music. I traded in my old Echo to get a credit for this one. I should have kept the old one instead. The speaker is really bad on this device and is not nearly as clear as the other echos I own. I am disappointed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wish i would have ordered one sooner!
reviews.reviewText:
I have been looking at the echos for awhile and have been on the verge of buying one and could not pass up the prime day pricing. Im so happy i did.

Set up was a breeze and the touchscreen made entering in information quick and easy. The display if vivid with adjuatable brightness and although i had a concern with the screen size viewing the echo 5 from across the room is no issue.

If you have not picked up a show yet, do it

reviews.reviewTitle: The size is perfect for a nightstand...
reviews.reviewText: Also got the magnetic stand, if it's reverse-mounted, the combination can be set on its side and viewed comfortably while you're lying in bed. Never liked sitting up in bed to read or watch TV, this orientation allows one to fall asleep readily, perfect for watching movies.

This is a great device for the money. It's half the cost of the Echo clock. The speakers are functional for communicating with Alexa, but the speakers are a little underpowered. The touch screen is a little difficult to interact with; however, I understand the first generation Echo Show has the same issues. Overall it's a good value for the money.
It's a nice addition to the kitchen, replacing the standard round unit. I like the fact that it has a screen.

I feel the quality of the echo show 5 is excellent. We have had a lot of fun asking Alexa a myriad of questions on an endless number of topics. My only negative comment has nothing to do with the quality in workmanship or the operation of the echo show 5. I just wish I would have ordered the larger screen size echo. I would highly recommend the Echo Show 5.

This is an incomplete product. They sell a stand that hold up the show that would help the angle of the monitor and camera. The stand will also help the microphone since it is located underneath the show towards the front. For the price on prime day it’s still a steal but $20 for the stand is not.
My favorite echo yet. I have 7 now. Even one for my travel bag. Still waiting for one for my car!

I use it as an alarm clock on my nightstand. (Just be careful cause the alarm won’t go off if there is no power). I also have it set up to view my ring doorbell and it works pretty well at that too. I just wish that I could see the camera quicker. That could be rings fault and not the echo. Not really sure. But overall I think it’s a pretty cool little device.

reviews.reviewTitle: Is it awesome? I don't know
reviews.reviewText:
I was very excited about to purchase this device and let me say right away I may still be excited. My biggest issue is currently I have it doing about three things. The routines work great and I love that aspect. But that's all I'm really using it for.
Now I'm sure the device can do so much more but my complaint is how do I find that out? I've searched youtube for advice and tuturials but feel that when you get a device like this it should come with more "how to's".
I love the device I just don't love the feeling that I'm not able to use it to it's full potential.

Not enough sound for older people. They say grandpa I got you a show.well they cant hear it. Video calls are limited. Needs to be open to everyone.
Was easy to install and run. Not as voice sensitive as my dot. Liked the screen. Like it has the camera. Dont like the limited camera use. I like the drop in to check on family and elders. Wish it had a wide view on camera so you can see more.

I like this device over all. Mostly the screen size to watch movies and news. The only thing I’m not completely satisfied with is the mic on the device. It doesn’t always hear me correctly and it gets frustrating at times. My eco dot in the kitchen never misses anything I say. The other thing I’m slightly disappointed by is what ever processor it is using, isn’t very fast. Things seem to load slow after I ask Alexa questions or loading programs in general.
Now that I've had one, couldn't live without it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not a big fan. Theoretically amazing product, but not quite there.
reviews.reviewText:
Sound quality was poor. Maybe the other speakers are better but the show5 speakers are trash for listening to music.

Alexa isn't very smart. If I say volume 50% she'll say "must be a value between 1 and 10." Dude, alexa can multiply 10 by 50% and set the volume to 5, not that hard.

Lots of things I'd want to be able to do on the touch screen but I have to go to the alexa app on my phone. What's the point of the screen then? Thought that was pretty annoying and dumb.

Anyway, too expensive to not be able to do such simple tasks. Returned it within 30 days of purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sound quality is a great leap forward
reviews.reviewText: I can see why this was the latest release instead of an earlier release. It goes a long way toward making the Dot and the Show superfluous. It doesn't necessarily replace them, but it is in my opinion just the best combination of size, capability and price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Would order the Echo 5 again. Like the display.
reviews.reviewText: I added this Echo 5 to our living room to use with my Firestick. The only thing I don’t like about having multiple Alexas (we have 3), is that only one of them can be designated to use our amazon unlimited music account. Would like to have that option available on all three devices.
I like that the screen is larger then the previous version. It’s like the echo show 2 had a baby, very cute.

Get skills added to this! Go to alexa.amazon.com and find some skills.
Or try to say Enable Sleep Sounds skill, Open/play Sleep Sounds.
It's perfect for an alarm clock and helps get good rest. I use these commands nightly: "Play thunderstorm sounds, Set alarm/timer for..., and Screen Off" Saying Alexa screen off turns the display light off. the screen turns on once she hears a command or an alarm goes off.
I can also drop in on my dog so that is cool.
You can have it in the kitchen to use as a cooking tool too (timer/ask recipes) I have yet to try it and see how well it works.

reviews.reviewTitle: especially like the quick look of what the weather is for the day ahead, works great
reviews.reviewText: This item was an improvement from the previous item I used from Alexa, especially the screen look for daily items that pop up to keep you informed of the day ahead in your area. Nice to see your own pictures as the background. sound is much improved.

I was excited when I seen this come out. I’ve been wanting a smart clock that had good sound quality. I use this every day and have not had any issues. Even with its compact size the sound quality is awesome. Would definitely recommend this for a bedroom or office.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good until you realize how much heat it gives off
reviews.reviewText: There are quite a few praises for this device. However, the reason why I’m only giving the product 3 stars is because of something that I haven’t really seen mentioned anywhere: the device gets really hot. As hot as a modem, to give an example. I know many users, me included, would seldom touch the device since it has Alexa integration. But the fact that it gets to such temperatures is concerning. I’ve returned 2 and tried 3 devices so far. There was no difference. I like the device and what it’s capable of, but the heat it gives off is concerning and gives me the impression that it’s poorly made.

I bought this product along with the Amazon cameras. I thought I would be able to ask it to show me the view of the cameras in each room, but it doesn't. I need to use my iPhone/ipad to see the rooms. It does not do much more than my Echo Dot which was much less money.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's small, but I like it.
reviews.reviewText: It's about the size of a cell phone, so I use it as a substitute for my bedside radio. Having lost about 30 percent of my hearing, the fact that I can adjust the bass, mid-range, and treble prompts me to give it 5 stars for sound quality. YouTube video image quality is on a par with a decent cell phone.

Great echo device for the money. It does everything my other echo's do with a video screen. I bought 2 of these during prime day and the price was fantastic. Why would you not buy one of these devices? I especially love the alarm clock feature. Thank you Amazon for such a great product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Voice recognition is horrible compared to other echo's.
reviews.reviewText: I haven't used it much but it's in the kitchen where I had my previous Google home. I have to be right next to for Alexa to hear me. I like the fact that it has a screen but haven't really used it much. If you don't mind taking loudly while having your first coffee if the day you'll be ok.
Bought this on prime day, and we love it. Works really well, can recognize our voices easily. Sounds and video is very clear.

While visiting family we used the google home hub to play nursery rhyme videos for my son. He was obsessed and learned so much from them. We got the Alexa show on deal day, and have been EXTREMELY disappointed. I feel even more angry at the fact that I could’ve used the money on a deal that was actually a good product.

I tell Alexa to play a video, and she MAYBE plays it, after a forever long silent pause for an ad. Half way through videos it pauses for ads, and it’s just ridiculous. It doesn’t even compare to the google home hub, and I’m beyond disappointed.

Very disappointed ☹️. Purchased this to use with my Ring doorbell (wanted a screen) and for music in the kitchen. First one went bad after 2 weeks with crackling, fluctuating volume, rattling and distortion of the audio. This was returned for a second unit which was fine until after 3 weeks when the same thing happened. The periods of distortion lasts 5-10 minutes and punctuate periods where the audio is fine. Hopefully they can work out the issues; I’ll wait for the next generation of the Show 5.
My wife loves it. She uses it everywhere. Kitchen for recipes, as an alarm clock, a Bluetooth speaker hook up for music

It works well. It won’t turn my light on and off like my dots do. It says there are more than on light. There’s not. Only one smart plug in the house. When my niece comes to visit she’ll get it to work. More than likely. Other than that it’s fun.

This is exactly what I was looking for in a digital assistant/clock/speaker. I love having Alexa assist in making lists and different reminders. I linked this to my Spotify and the sound quality is great—it can get loud! You can dim the screen so it’s not super bright at night. I’m going to buy these for my family so we can use the video chat feature. There’s a cover for the camera as well so you can cover it up while it’s not in use.
I can watch the news a movie, tv. Works with the ring door bell. The only thing that is missing Volume leveling !!!

If you turn off all the interactive displays, the Echo Show goes blank for a couple, of what seems to be, very long seconds. Developers need to an update immediately, it very annoying as well as it should never go to a blank screen.

I was pleasantly surprised with the sound quality: it is superb.

There is only one reason I am giving it 4/5 stars instead of 5/5. To be clear, this has nothing to do with the device itself but with services available on the Echo. Amazon and Google are no longer in a brawl. YouTube is now on FireTV devices. Naturally, I expect it on Echo devices as well. --> 4/5 stars because I am confident Amazon is not allowing third parties to make videos available on the Echo shows.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very nice looking. Nice and compact
reviews.reviewText: We love it. Love using the timer and listening to music. I actually used it to play white noise so I could fall asleep!

Purchased this mainly to use as an alarm clock for my husband. Very easy to read without his glasses. Most importantly, extremely easy to set and change alarm times. If the power goes out, we don't have to look for the book to see how to set the time and the alarms.
Our kids love this mini version of the Echo Show. It serves as a night clock and displays lyrics as you listen to songs

I have tried to remove the “try this” from my screen multiple times. I don’t mind the screen changing from weather and back to the clock. But it’s annoying to see all the try this adds. I use it for an alarm clock I haven’t really noticed any motion detection on the device

The Echo features all work very nicely. The sound quality is nice but not as good as the regular Echo 2nd Generation. All in all I use it for my wife's alarm, music, the weather, news, and the occasional video call. $89 is a great price for the Show 5 and I got it on Prime Day at nearly half off. I wish I order two.

I bought this to replace a clock radio as it had all the features I wanted a clock radio to have and many more. Therefore I have not put it through all of the paces that I should and I will not give it 5 stars yet. But so far it has done everything I ask and voice recognition is as good as or better than all my other Amazon devices.

reviews.reviewTitle: Should have checked the screen size
reviews.reviewText: For the most part I am enjoying my Echo, but, I should have checked the screen size. The compact display Echo 5 Show is the size of my iPhone screen. For a product that will remain stationary in my bedroom, I needed a larger screen. Also, at times the sound quality is not as expected due to static. My only other complaint has to do with the variety/diversity of the music stations. Not all gospel stations start and end with Kirk Franklin.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice addition to the Echo line!
reviews.reviewText: I love this size of this. Being older, it's nice to have the larger screen. Responds nicely to voice commands, and has good sound.

reviews.reviewTitle: THIS THING SUCKS. GREAT PRODUCT, AMAZON.
reviews.reviewText: Make a video or phone call--but you can't hear the other person, no matter how high it's turned up. Right out of the box, as a gift for my 84 year old mother it somehow glitched and made said I CAN'T HELP YOU WITH FART...not kidding...then i tried to ask Alexa to tell a joke AND IT WAS A GAY JOKE. HAHAHA NOT FUNNY. Seriously Amazon? Are you pranking me?

Super piece of technology. After being a fan of apple for almost a decade and using the HomePod
For a month. And echo for more than a month.

Echo shines in many way, first and foremost a picture speaks a thousand words the amazing screen lights up with all visual info. My 2 daughters are searching information for projects on the echo they haven’t touched the iPad since echo. Intergrared camera lets me be in touch with family instantly while travelling, integration with home devices like my lg AI tv and MI led bulb was super easy and works like a charm.

The best part though is the clock

Bought the Echo Show 5 on Prime Day to use as a bedroom device/alarm clock. It has functioned well for that purpose. Occasionally, I have to repeat commands because the device doesn't hear me and I'm also having a hard time getting the device to connect with my home Blink cameras. Otherwise, I'm very happy with the device and the features it provides.

This is my new addition to my smart home (6th to be exact) exactly what I expected... small which was a bit surprising (5.5” screen) but it fit perfect in my bedroom... I just swapped my 10.1 to this one and used the other Show in kitchen! Perfect!

I'm not sure why there are negative comments. The Show 5 is simply a echo on steroids. It's nice to be able to see the weather on the screen when you ask it, the news, todo lists ect... I use it for Ring cameras, I have 5 of them and it works great!

It’s the absolute best alarm clock I’ve ever had!i I am extremely disappointed that it doesn’t support FaceTime! It said video chat but it is only with other echo products or Skype. I cannot get my Furbo to connect. It needs more options for clock faces. Sound quality is really pretty good.

The Show 5 works nice, and now we can read the clues when we play Jeopardy. However the way the questions are asked changed, and sometimes it seems to lag way behind on it's responses to our answers. And that's on all our Alexa units, not just this one. It hangs up sometimes when playing and we have to start over.

I have been thinking of upgrading to a device with screen and got Show 5 last week. Show 5 looks amazing on my desk. It does everything that my echo dot did plus video calling, being able to see results , multi speaker setup make it a great device.

Have every Alexa in existence and this one behaves the best. Picks up my voice and responds no matter the music volume. Only complaint, is the speakers on the device are a tad liking, but that is a preference and others may not crank it up.

The picture quality is quite good and it is nice to see news stories and cooking recipes with video. This replaced our Echo 1st generation. We like the smaller size and video screen but the sound quality is slightly lower though still good.

I bought this on Prime day and did a trade in, so effectively i bought this in $30 which makes it a amazing product on this cost. Sound is superb. You can use this as a bed side clock which can also act as a rotating personal photo frame. So many features packed in. Must buy.
It detects cars moving on the street. It listens to your conversation without being called. Not cool

reviews.reviewTitle: Major limitations compared to other Echo products
reviews.reviewText:
1. Cannot pair to Amazon TV Recast like the big echo show can.
2. There is no tap to talk feature like most of other echo products do. You have to yell "Alexa" every time.
3. The camera angled up so you'll be looking at your ceiling most of the time.

This is our fourth Alexa purchase and got this one for our bedroom (replaced the echo dot with this). Very nice having the clock and since we also have Alexa connected security cameras, you just have to say "Echo, show me the front door".

This is a new family favorite! We have hooked it up to your Boise speakers, so we can hear Alexa througout the house! Our teen loves doing trivia and other games with Alexa. We gave one to my mom, and it's now so easy to talk with her and see her face! She loves it!

Perfect on my nightstand. Still trying to figure out the bells and whistles... for instance: why does the screen go black on mine (with a red clock) and my husbands doesn't. I've been through all the settings and can't figure it out. Other than that, I love it.

This is not quite the "Alexa" that my son or my cousin has. She is not as interactive or as funny as some others I have heard. She also does not have the sound quality that I have heard before. She will probably suit my needs, however.
I just wish it had a more comprehensive owners' manual

I love this thing so much I have 3 Alexa’s now this ones my favorite I wish I could pick it up and take it everywhere in the house but that’s fine it’s sensitive so I don’t need to scream at the top of my lungs for it to understand me like my dot I got it to face time my dogs while I’m at work they love it too it’s great.worth every penny

We needed an alarm clock. Our cell phones are barred from the bedroom. We had been using an old AM/FM radio clock that was dusty and big-it took up a good deal of the bedstead. Our newEcho is small, easily read, can be set from our phones and does all and more than that old radio ever did. Also, I love the alarm choices. LOL!

I should Have bought this a long time ago! I like the sound quality for kids size like the lyrics when you’re playing music. I am still learning how to use it but this is very user-friendly you just have to follow prompts and connected to the Wi-Fi... easy!

Already have many Alexa devices and bought two of these to add to secondary rooms in the home.
Great price, work well, small form factor.

Recommend as long as you do not want or need large screens or high quality speakers.

Am enjoying this device, which was a great value on Prime Day. Am using it mainly as a space-saving kitchen radio replacement. Ability to link to my Sirius XM subscription is an unexpected bonus. Surprisingly good sound quality. set up very easy.
Just one more great Alexa item to add to my home. Great picture quality and sound. Love the drop in feature
Not too happy with this Echo Show. It stops playing music mid song or pauses a few times during a song.
I was given this product and it seems pretty worthless, but I don't want to throw it out due to awkwarness even though the trash is where it belongs. Stick with your Google phone/Siri and Bluetooth

reviews.reviewTitle: Its a fancy alarm clock with picture.
reviews.reviewText: Yes, it has Alexa - I can use it to do so many things! But I use it in my bedroom - so its relegated as an alarm clock and playing ocean sounds at night to help me sleep. I'm sure it has a great many more things it can do. I just don't need or want them.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sound quality needs work, too much "selling" Amazon /Alexa "stuff"
reviews.reviewText: Poor sound quality vs the reg echo, too many scrolling "ads" or ad-like things. Hopefully they start updating it soon.

Amazing, didn't know the screen would be so useful.
It's the small things like showing lyrics or quick video calls. Love it
I use this Echo show for entertainment. I am quite pleased with my Echo. I plan on expanding my use.
This show is the perfect size for our bedroom. We use the alarm to wake for work. Playing our tunes is a bonus.

Works as advertised, its a little hard of hearing, I have to speak up, however I use it in the bedroom so it does a greaat job of being a bedside clock. EXCELLENT tone quality, I have five Alexa and use it daily to listen to talk radio on all of them, this one and the Original show sound best.

I bought this so I could watch tv at work & in my kitchen. I don't like having a full sized tv in my face all the time. It worked great initially. But the new update makes it no longer work with anything but Amazon Prime videos. So irritating.

Just the whole "getting the right words in the right order to execute a command". I want to wake up every day to the classical piano at 7:00 AM, and I want the volume to increase slowly. Not easy. And it goes away. after I set it. WTF?

reviews.reviewTitle: I really wanted to like it
reviews.reviewText:
Couldn't get voice control to work for my smarthome. Tech support couldn't fix it after two attempts. Could be the unit was bad or the software had bugs. I gave up.

I have a full size Show that worked great out of the box. Returned this.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not too happy. Prefer the Echo Dot
reviews.reviewText: I was very excited for this product. We have had it for a few months now and we prefer our echo dot. This echo show has activated on it's own at night when everyone is asleep which is really creepy, but does a really poor job of recognizing when we are calling her. Half the time she doesnt even understand us. We have never had these issues with the dot. :/
Sound is muffled without a stand and Alexa can’t hear me half the time compared to my regular echo 2nd gen

It is easy to use and came quickly. I don’t like that you have to keep it plugged in while you use it. I got myself and grandson one. He likes to take the phone when we FaceTime and show me all his toys. He can’t do that with this so he gets disinterested quickly.

I have several Amazon Alexa devices. This is my newest purchase, and it sets up very easily much like the rest. My issue is that it has a hard time hearing me, much more than the other devices, and I have a big fat mouth. I really don't recommend it. Either the microphone itself is crap or it's poorly situated in the unit itself.

The only drawback is the the separate $19.99 stand should have come with it at the $89.99 price of the Show 5. i like the camera cover feature but it still listens to you. I think i hear it giggle once in a while when i fart out loud. Maybe not, i don't know.

reviews.reviewTitle: "Try This" is a pain but great unit
reviews.reviewText: Amazon needs to allow you to turn OFF the "Try This" stuff. Nothing There is more obnoxious than looking for the clock on the Home screen and the clock text is really small so the stupid thing can say "Try saying: Listen to easy listening music" etc. Otherwise Alexa is great and better than the other brands.

I love it! I have 3 echos in my house. The large echo show in the kitchen, echo dot in the bathroom and this echo show in the bedroom. Overall a great product. I only use it for music and it has wonderful sound quality and can get pretty loud. Voice recognition is great too. I don’t know why it took so long for me to join the “Alexa” party lol.

reviews.reviewTitle: May be the best Alexa yet
reviews.reviewText: Sound quality is good compared to a dot or spot, screen size is reasonable, and it works. The only downside is that the screen may be a little off for doing video calls. It's roughly 5" wide by 2 1/2" tall which makes for a small proportionate video call.

reviews.reviewTitle: Worse than useless as an alarm clock!
reviews.reviewText:
I bought this to use as a bedside alarm clock. First nights were great, was really happy with the purchase. Clock faces and item design are discrete. Ability to wake up on music and manage alarms worked as expected.
Then this morning, I snoozed the alarm, saw the on-screen confirmation that the alarm would sound again 9min after. BUT the alarm never sounded - at all.
I looked at online forums and this seems to be an issue unsolved for months. If Amazon does not solve it right aware, I am returning the device as useless.

I bet Alexa getting to hate me..........Alexa set alarm for 1 HR.........Alexa turn on the light..........Alexa ask Hong Kong Radio to play FM 90.3............Alexa STOP. LOL also got notification from RING door bell....."someone at your front door".........!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Convenient and a nice upgrade from the Dot
reviews.reviewText:
Hard to adjust sound using the buttons. One click and it is either too soft or too loud. Eventually it gets there.
Like the small compact unobtrusive nature of it. Placed it on my work-desk. Also like the news headlines that flash by.

It does all the basics just like the other two devices I have but the audio is nowhere near as good for music. When I play Pandora it sounds muffled.
So if you get it for the screen you will like it but don't expect it to have sound quality like the regular Alexa devices.

It’s great. Great deep bass and crisp highs. Until it started crackling. One day the speaker in it just started cracking and now it sounds horrible. I never use it anymore. Wasted $50 or however much it cost, I honestly don’t remember, it was back in July that I bought it.
I have three Dots, one Spot and now the Show 5. I only wish all the rest were Show 5's too :-)

you still cannot turn of the Try"Alexa,whatever..." from displaying at the bottom changing every time the screen changes or you interact with it.
Amazon this seems a big complaint from what i've read---please allow us to turn this off completely

reviews.reviewTitle: Works ok but- sucks for video calling
reviews.reviewText: Alexa features work well/ speakers are excellent- but bought this primarily as an easy way to communicate with family - u fortuantelyangling the screen is difficult and visibility from more than 6 feet away makes the small screen Mt well suited for video conversations-

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Addition to my Alexa Device Family
reviews.reviewText: I already had 2 echo spots & 1 dot. I wanted one more for my bathroom, so I bought this one on Prime Day. I use it as my alarm clock and like it a lot. Similar features to the spot, and I was able to modify the constant screen scrolling the same way I did with that model.
I own two kindles, a fire stick, the echo dot, the echo input, and now the echo show. The show is by far my favorite so far. I love the picture quality and video chats

Vivo en Costa Rica, lo compre , y estoy muy contento, se adapta bien a mis necesidades y pronto comprare otro para otras áreas de mi casa
Actualización 1
Con las nuevas skill en español, ya puedo escuchar noticias, recetas en español. Las recetas de Costa Rica, son un éxito. Ya reconoce mi voz. Le doy 10 estrellas.

Very loud base sound..
I had to turn the base sound all the way off.
Turn mid range to about 75% and the treble to full on.

No Alixa app in unt. No bay to load camera setup. Have to use some thing else to setup?

I have this in the kitchen to keep me company when I cook either through cooking or the latest episode of the Gran Tour. Love to be able to check in on my Wyze cameras whenever I need. Looking forward to getting another one for the living room. I do keep the camera off for privacy reasons.
The most useful feature I found over the dot was the ability to view security cams from several different manufacturers.

I've got lots of echo devices--original, dot, spot, show and TV. Added this one for the nightstand. Nice screen, and seems to have more/newer features. I leave it withe camera covered--nice little mechanical slider does the job. Another winner.

reviews.reviewTitle: All the capabilities and be able to utilize it effectively.
reviews.reviewText: I dont know how to use it too well yet.lol is there motion detection? I like I can ask for the weather and my music from my phone. I got two; one for me and my daughter to call if an emergency and also to video talk to her. They live a couple hours away. I'm a senior so its nice to keep communication with family.
I was looking for a clock with easy to read numbers and easy to use. This fits that bill and can be used for much more.

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo show is the way to go
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this Show on Prime day with a BMI k security system we have been very pleased with this echo show and the blink system

reviews.reviewTitle: Not my favorite of the amazon products
reviews.reviewText: To be honest this new echo doesn’t seem to pick up sound as well as the echo dot or original echo. I have a few of these in every room and this one by far is the least responsive. It’s cool looking but the other versions seem much more clear to hear and also to speak to. Would just recommend you stick with an echo or echo dot.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice Colorful Screen Adds to Echo's Utility
reviews.reviewText: Love the screen as it really adds to the overall Alexa experience in many ways. The unit does get quite warm, I assume because it is on all the time. The display is bright and clear and fast to update and adds a lot of functionality and enjoyment to the Echo.

Exchanged my gen 1 echo dot for the echo show during prime day. I don't have a lot of smart home devices to really take advantage of the screen but it's nice to have the weather on display all the time and see the flash new briefings.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is as good as my big Echo Show
reviews.reviewText: This little Echo Show has great video and sound and functions just as well as the big one. Love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Siri thinks I live two states away from where I actually do and somehow is more useful!
reviews.reviewText: If I wanted something to repeatedly tell me to go an check an app on my phone I would have these interactions with my kids instead of this annoying, useless little box. Save your time and money and wait till the tech gets way better, it is nothing like the commercials.

I wasn't sure about the Echo Show when I ordered it, but it was so reasonable on Prime Day so I ordered....and I'm so happy with it. I love that the numbers are so big; the illumination dims at night; the alarm worked perfectly; I play my Amazon music library, etc.. I'm extremely happy with this purchase!

Great purchase. Really like the scrolling on home screen. Helps my brain to wake up before I get out of bed. The auto dimmer feature is great as well and the clock face can be seen from across the room. Speaker is pretty decent and sounds even better when linked into the everywhere group for music.
Perfect for my upstairs! Does not take up much space and I can see whose at my front door without running downstairs.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not as Good as other Echo Products
reviews.reviewText: Listening ability is very poor. Not even worth raising voice for it to register most of the time. Won't easily start timers when cooking. Also, it started advertising that I read my daily horoscope, which is garbage I don't in my home.

This has been a lifesaver for my mother (90+) who lives hours from me who needs voice driven devices. It is one thing that helps to keep her independent. Being able to hold things up for me to see has saved us lots of heartache.
I really like the Echo Show 5. The price was nice and I can sync it with my other Echo products, doorbell and security cameras

reviews.reviewTitle: Very usable screen for its size
reviews.reviewText: Not as cute as our Echo Spots, but the screen is much more usable. I was skeptical since 5” didn’t sound like much, but it’s the perfect size for a smaller Echo. Sound quality could be better, a bit too bassy for my taste with the small speaker.

I needed new alarm clocks and saw these. I love my echo dots and decided to upgrade to the show. The video display is amazing, and it has all of the Alexa features that I have loved over the years. It works great with my ring doorbell and I can see it from bed now. I love the fact that I do not have to get out of bed to turn on/off lights.
Great product! I have 2 Shows and a Dot that control my house!

This Alexa device is horrible. I have ring and Wyze cameras and won’t show them. It can see them but when I use voice it says it can’t find them. At one point it even said I wasn’t the account owner and someone else was. Very disappointed by the product. I moved and had to wait to open the package so now I’m stuck and can’t even return it. Thinking of switching to google

My old school alarm clock broke so I bought this to replace it. Love that I can check the ring camera, play music and have an alarm clock next to my bed ...all in one. So many other features that we haven’t tried but we are pleased!

reviews.reviewTitle: I'm a low tech guy, in a high tech world.....
reviews.reviewText: ....So I'm still learning all the things the Show 5 can do. So far, so good. I like it, if for no other reasons, I can view my home cameras on it. She has many tricks up her sleeve, and I need to learn more tricks to do with her!
I’m having fun playing with these devices. I’m surprised how much language the device understands.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cute little device but rather expensive for what it does
reviews.reviewText: Fills a spot on the counter. Echo dot second gen from across the living room responds before this one does every time. You have to talk quietly and very close to it for it to hear you and respond. The sound is pretty good though.

i bought this on Amazon Prime day for only $49.00 and it was well worth it, i love it. It was very easy to set up for some people the screen might be a little small if they want to watch videos but the screen is bigger than a cell phone so i find it pretty good , i think the sound quality is good. It can do so many things but im still learning about it, definitely would recommend it
We love it. Great screen and sound quality! Nice to see the changing info on the screen with news and weather. We ca now easily call our daughter who just moved out of state since I got her one also!

A good addition to the household. I have this in my bedroom.
Very easy to set up to control lights, thermostats, loads Pa dora and many other skills.
I use this as my alarm clock, also.
One drawback, no USB port to charge my 'phone.
Would not hesitate to recomend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Alexa, Please keep the clock face on my screen!
reviews.reviewText: I really do like the Alexa Show so if you don’t share my one complaint you will be pleased with this device. What I don’t like is that when I am listening to a radio station, or playing prime music, the clock face goes away, and the radio station or the music being played appear on the screen 95% of the time. My Alexa Spot returns to the clock face after a half minute and continues to display the time. I contacted Amazon about this and was told a future software update would fix this. I’m waiting.

Bought this during Prime days and got great deal on it. Love it. Keep on nightstand and use it as an alarm clock in the morning. Tells me the weather forecast for the day and makes suggestions from time to time. Sound quality for playing music is good.

This one is not sensitive at all I find myself repeating what I would like to have it do multiple times. It is in my living room and I can stand right next to it and it will not recognize it. Very frustrating in comparison to other Alexa devices.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4 years later and still HINT branding b.s. on screen devices including Show 5
reviews.reviewText: Short message to potential users. Household with multi devices and still Amazon chooses to force hints and suggestions on users, even after changing settings to click off various customization settings. Amazon doesn't listen to their customer base and should peak at Apple or 99% of other major electronic brand names, and if we spend $$$s with you, we don't want or need constant branding or remedial hints. Time to stop being pleasant with customer service reps who tow the line on overkill branding.

I was hoping to replace my Show (1 Gen) with this. My 3 Star means that this thing is just average for an Echo device. Id give it a higher rating if it worked with apps that stream live TV, like Hulu or Sling. Echo Show has this ability but not the (5).
Two thumbs up

reviews.reviewTitle: Slideshow clock background feature is extremely poor
reviews.reviewText: Using the clock slideshow feature is disappointing. I have over 1000 pictures loaded on Amazon photo and when I set the clock background to personal photos fed from Amszon photos, it repeats the same dozen photos over and over. I also have several albums set up and when I set it to show one album it shows pictures thay are not in that album. The slideshow clock feature gets no stars in my opinion.

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo Show 5 does not work with HULU. BIG FAIL AMAZON!!!
reviews.reviewText: It was annoying when the Echo Spot could not play Hulu. Only the Echo Show could stream Hulu. Now there is the product Echo Show 5. It has the "Echo Show" in its name and the expectation is that it has the capabilities of the larger Echo Show except in a smaller screen but it doesnt. It has the same limitations as the Echo Spot when it comes to streaming Hulu. MASSIVE FAIL AMAZON!!!

I have this great item in my kitchen. I can watch cooking videos, general videos, and listen to music. I can talk to someone from my echo show 5 and I can ask questions and get answers. Just love my Echo Show 5. Recommend it to everyone.

reviews.reviewTitle: I love it, just the speakers are not the best.
reviews.reviewText: My 3 store review doesn't mean I don't love it. The reason for the 3 stars is because the sound. I have 3 echos and this one sounds the worst when you play music. But overall I love the screen and all the features. I just wish the speakers were better.

in all honesty it does what its supposed to do and it works , what else can you ask from it? the sound is not earth shattering and sometimes its annoying to have to re-add my smart devices to this new device but its a minor step. ENJOY

I can't say enough about the new Echo Show 5. The design is perfect and the display is impeccable. I have two other Amazon Echo Dot devices in my home, but the Echo Show 5 is our absolute favorite. Don't hold back and pull the trigger.....you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice, affordable Alexa with a screen
reviews.reviewText: Obviously fits into the Alexa echo ecosystem flawlessly and the only knock on it is that, like the Spot, it does not seem to hear as well as the smaller Dots. I have it setup so it is integrated with my Arlo cameras and Ring doorbell.

Love that we can use it to watch movie check on security cameras.. but if you are looking for something to play music with get the dot or echo 3rd gen.. this one is only good for monitoring and great tool if you are learning how to cook or need some recipes..

Using this in the master bedroom. It is great for music, news, clock features. We like the look, the ease of set up, and the variety of features. Easy to read clock face. Unlike my most recent clock device, this is indeed user friendly.
I love this! It can display recipes, news, song lyrics and more! It's a great size and will fit just about anywhere!
Configured in Minutes. Workes great with Show and nicely integrates my Nest doorbell.
It's a good device, better than previous iterations. Screen size seems just right. Alexa can be a bit sensitive but otherwise a great device.

reviews.reviewTitle: MUCH better than the little ECHO SPOT
reviews.reviewText:
Bought 2 of these to replace ECHO spots. MUCH BETTER screen display. My 80+ Mom can see us much better now on hers.
Get the additional tilt stand to go with it. Makes a HUGE difference. 👍

Great product. The picture quality on video calls is sufficient.
HD quality video plays on the device itself

I’m not entirely impressed with the sound quality, it’s very muffled, it may be because I need to purchase the stand.

Either way this device will never leave my kitchen

I love this Echo Show product. It's compact, well-designed, and user-friendly. It was easy to set up and navigate. It is versatile and adds a nice touch to my desk area. I have music, books and news just a command away. I highly recommend the product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Will not show front door camera
reviews.reviewText: I don't know how to make it show me the "ring" camera and that's why I bought it. It alerts me to motion but won't display..The constant suggestions are REALLY annoying!!!! It's a good thing it stops and dims when the lights are off or it would be outta here.

I love all of the Echo products and have several. This one is very nice and like the larger screen. The only downside is the speakers and sound quality are not quite as good when the volume is up. I have read that from other reviews as well. But overall, good product for price.

Alexia doesn't have many answers to questions so far, but I understand it takes time to build. But its so much easier to use her to turn on the music and play what I ask for instead of stopping what I'm doing to turn it or anything else on. I love it

reviews.reviewTitle: Lacking mics? Not as responsive as echo dot.
reviews.reviewText: Got a good deal on this on prime day. Beautiful screen and sound. Removing 1 star for lacking mics? Alexa seems to be deaf now, not as responsive as my echo dots and removing another star for not including a stand. Stand costs an arm and a leg.

Save your money! This Does Not integrate with the 2 way audio on the blink camera. They were bundled together for prime day. It has many issues playing flash briefings. I have spent hours of my time on the phone and email, had to order a replacement that also did not work. Finally I asked for a refund and they made me pay to send it back! And I'm a prime member.
Stick with the echo dot. The Show is not ready and has too many glitches.

Have a 1st gen show and it is much better. The screen on this one is very small. Not as responsive either. I was going to return but I got it at a fantastic price during Prime days so I'll keep it. I guess it is OK for bedside

I love the compact size and the screen. I also gave one to my 86 year old mother and she is really enjoying it. She can see her front door with the Ring doorbell and I can “drop in” to check on her. Some people don’t like the Alexa suggestions that constantly show up, but I don’t mind since I’m not using it by my bed. Still have my Echo and my Dots, but I’m glad I bought the Echo Show 5 on Prime Day.

I replaced a first generation echo with this. Needless to say, voice recognition and the fact that I can view everything I ask on screen is a huge leap in technology and very useful. I don't have to repeat myself numerous times anymore. I especially like the fact that it pretty much sets itself up straight out of the box. Just a few on-screen clicks of preferences and Wi-Fi passwords and you're ready to go!

Sent one to my cousin back east and they have a hard time to set it up so I got one to see what the problem was and had mine set up and ready to go in less than 15 minutes. I exchanged it with my regular clock by my bed and it works great. It does everything my Alexa show in the living room does so no matter where I am in the house one is always near by. I love it. It’s great .

This is our best Alexa yet. We have the dot and spot already and we just bought this on prime day in July to try it out as a potential gift for my mom at Christmas. We absolutely love it and will be getting more. The size is perfect for our living room area.

Just okay. I have a lot of Echo products. This one is hardest to use and very limited as to where you can set it. Can’t be too high or low in the room, or you won’t see the people you’re talking to. Stand doesn’t help much because it doesn’t let you tilt up.

We have the older large style of Show as well as several dots and the original echo throughout our house. They all work great. This new style of Show is perfect for in the bedroom to serve as an alarm clock and on my desk for quick references and a clock.
We just love everything about this! It's easy to use, doesn't take up much room, and an overall great value.

I use this as my alarm clock. So everything I use it for works amazing. I would for sure recommend this to anyone looking for an alarm clock. So much more. As for a radio the sound isn’t the best. Works ok but not as main radio in any room

reviews.reviewTitle: Like the device dislike costomer service
reviews.reviewText: I didnt like that 2 days after I bought it they had it on sale i called amazon customer service and asked if they could price match it like they did b4 and they said no after i traded in my echo dot this was not Wright at all I will never trade my old device in again. But I do like the echo show I like the fact it has good sound and makes it easy to set up my lights but I dislike Amazon's costomer service.

I bought this in a bundle... the word 'compact' wasn't in the title. I assumed it was the size of the previous 'echo show's' & ordered without reading details... pretty disappointed... yet my own fault for not reading into it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great device but the updates take features away
reviews.reviewText: They display this with the clock large in the display. That is how mine worked until they decided to update it and now you can only see the small clock displayed in the corner. Multiple phone calls and even a device replacement did not fix the issue. They have yet to get back to me after a call 2 weeks ago. Disappointed in the customer service. The device itself is great but I need the large clock display.

reviews.reviewTitle: It compact and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Screen are perfect for me not too big and too small, small enough so doesn't take much space on the nightstand

I recently purchased the Echo Show 5 as a replacement to the Echo Spot. In comparison, the speaker is much better than the Echo Spot. Everything else is about the same to me. I know I don't use all the features available.

I like the small size of the Echo 5 and have placed it on an end table next to my favorite recliner. This Echo 5 serves as my personal attendant for adjusting lights, audio books, playing music and changing television channels along with numerous other endeavors. Alexa likes to keep me in recline position. Thanks Alexa!!

Works great. Shows weather, songs, etc. on the screen. Sounds good too. Not quite as good as an Echo but not bad. I like that I can put my own background pics on it. Screens plenty big too. Runs my lights and everything that my Echos do.

I ordered 2 of these on Amazon Prime Day, one in White and one in black. We now have all the video Alexa devices. The show is great for the kitchen, the spot is great for the crammed desk top in the office, and the Show 5’s are the ideal nightstand Alexa. ordered them for both of my kids rooms, perfect for the Drop in feature and easy way to check on my boys. The kids obviously enjoy them for the music, the quizzing, and Alexa answers most of there simple questions now....

I guess I was expecting something smaller than the Echo Show By a couple inches and more compact all around. Instead this is bulkier than the show with a tiny screen half the size of the show. Dissapoinment. Skip this and just get the show!!

I own this and a Google hub... I'd give my Google hub a 5 start rating!
This echo show is ok and just ok , too small, expensive and the worst part is that I can't cast to it (I can cast anything from phone to Google hub)
Best thing I ever bought on Amazon.

I basically use this as an alarm clock. Purchased this during Prime days because of the reduced price. More as a curiosity than anything else. Functions well and is entertaining to mess with.

One issue I have is when my internet went out I was unable to set an alarm. A little disconcerting as in my case this is it's primary function. Haven't tested the functionality to determine if the alarm is set prior to the Internet going out if the alarm will still function. My guess is it won't, which I think is a huge shortcoming.. Will test it soon.

A very good product. Few points though.
First, whispering recognition needs an improvement. Sometimes I really need to get close to Echo to be heard.
Second - I really really miss my Echo Spot analog watch face. Could it be added to the Show 5?

reviews.reviewTitle: Great companion for Ring Door Bell
reviews.reviewText: We received this as free add-on when we purchased our Ring Doorbell Pro. It interfaces perfectly with the ring door bell. All we have to do is say, "Alexa, show me front door", and we see a live feed from the Ring Doorbell camera.

My wife has the second generation full size show, and I got this Show 5 smaller version. It is like having a shrunk down version of my wife's show. Very well made, perfect size so not intrusive, surprisingly good sound quality, and very easy to setup since I already had an older Amazon Echo and Alexa app. Music, videos, weather, traffic, and may other tasks can be performed. I recommend also getting the adjustable stand. It looks seamless and very functional to adjust angle of the show.

Awesome! Just a great Echo Show in a smaller size. Works very nicely in my bedroom and with all my Phillips Hue Lights and Arlo cameras.
Perfect size for any bedroom.
Sound is my ch better than the Echo Dot it replaces.

The sound quality is fine for the price but not the same as the larger Show. I use this one in the bedroom to connect to the other 7 units throughout the house. All are linked on the everywhere setting. The screen helps with "Question of the Day as you can read the questions which helps me. At party time you can put music everywhere.
The price makes this a great value.

I was hesitant about buying this one because I thought the sound quality would not be that good. But I was surprised at how good it sounds. I have it in my bedroom to replace my radio clock. The extra features are a bonus.

Had seen an ad for a new feature called Show and Tell, where you could hold up an object, and Alexa would tell you what it was. Unfortunately, this only appears to be available in the Show 2, not the Show 5, so had to send it back.

I got the 3 pack bundle thinking we can all listen a different song in each room. You can only listen on one device. How annoying. My 17 year old can't listen to what she likes if I am using the music app

reviews.reviewTitle: Not bad for first Smart Peaker foray.
reviews.reviewText: My first foray into smart speakers. Overall I like the the device although I expected be able to control more items from the interface. Also the fact it lacks google music integration is a bummer. Overall I like the purchase.

Works great on my nightstand. Screen automatically dims when the lights go off so it doesn’t light up the room. My favorite part is that if I left the front door unlocked Alexa will tell me and ask me if she should lock the door when I set my morning wake up alarm.

I have a big Show in my kitchen and wanted something a little smaller in my bedroom. The Spot was a little too small so I traded it in, got a 25% discount and trade-in value and got these on Prime Day! One for me and one to gift!

I ordered this version as I just wanted a smaller screen in my office to play music and videos.... Apparently HULU is not avail on the echo 5 only the echo show... Very disappointed but at least I purchased this during Prime and didn't waste $80. I don't understand why it can play prime videos but you need the 10" show to launch hulu.

This mini Echo Show is great on the beside table. We use it as a clock, an alarm, timer, music player, and we can do all the other Alexa-related things like add to our lists, drop in on household members, etc. It's great!

Smaller than I thought it'd be. I should have read the demensions. Screen size is smaller than my Note 9. Works just as good as my last echo. Sound quality sucks as a speaker though. I connected it to a Bluetooth speaker.

reviews.reviewTitle: Touch controls week. Doesn't stay connected well.
reviews.reviewText: I've had a lot of trouble with this not staying connected to the network. Also, it will show you camera views, but the to a h controls to move the veiw or zoom in don't work. It's also very choppy and slow to bring up cameras.
I haven't set up the voice yet but everything else I like. Using it to check on Mom who has dementia, as long as I can see her I'm good.
I love Alexa. The only woman in my life that actually listens to me and cares what I say.
This is my second Echo show. It does exactly want it says it will do. Very easy to set up. Price was excellent.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound and features at a fair price.
reviews.reviewText: Still learning. Should have provided a user manual or at least have one you could access or download.

Love the little unit , just be careful what you ask Alexa , she can self destruct if you ask about the end of the world ( yes YouTube is right about that one ) but in general she is pretty smart , hooked to my wireless cameras and I enjoy streaming from the unit

reviews.reviewTitle: Works perfect as the main floor hub.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to act as our main floor hub and give me visibility to by Front and Side Doors via Ring. Device is much more responsive and does an excellent job of handling that task so I no longer need to look at my phone.

I was in need of a new alarm clock and got lucky with the echo show 5. Very easy to setup and configured it to do everything from shutting off the TV to setting reminders and shopping lists which sync to my phone app. I’ve hesitated on other Amazon products but so far very pleased with this purchase.

Will not play over bluetooth while on a multi room group. That’s the only reason I use these. Wish I would have gone with Vizio SmartCast speakers instead. Gen 2 dots offer it so this one is going to be used as an alarm clock since I got it cheap.

reviews.reviewTitle: The perfect version of echo show for my place
reviews.reviewText: I just love it. I'm glad to have waited for the right echo show. I wasn't sure about the size when I saw the device online but now that is in place, I think is the perfect fit. I like the integration with my security cameras. Sound quality is good enough.

reviews.reviewTitle: Small screen, and does what it says, kind of...
reviews.reviewText: Hope new features become avail like looking at several ring alarm system video cameras at one time. OR at least displaying "front door video ring doorbell" on screen withing it timing out and going back to clock view.

reviews.reviewTitle: video calls are clear and good
reviews.reviewText: The viewing from blink camera takes time to appear. By the time it comes into view the person could be gone. Also, numerous times the blink camera would not sync in. My Internet provider is good at an average 40 to 50 mps. The Video calls make this device worthwhile.

I absolutely love this. I think the sound quality is better than some reviews. I don’t expect it to be outstanding but it is quite good. I’m sure there will be improvements in the future. I’m planning to purchase more in the coming months

Good sound for such a small speaker. Also integration with smart home devices works well.

Forecasted high and low temperatures are not accurate. 20-30 degrees Fahrenheit above our local televised forecasts.

Support was horrible on the issue previously mentioned here. Cut was not resolved as the rep did not understand the issue or the action necessary once he could not solve it personally.

I love this Echo. I have it in my office and throughout the day I can ask Alexa things or play a game or listen to music. I would however recommend buying the stand if you are considering buying one. There are so many things you can do with it.

Much better sound than my 1st. echo. Google assistant seems smarter; more intuitive. Alexa phone app cumbersome. Why do I have to do all the set up work? Aside from clock numbers; type too small for me to read well. I do not need glasses; yet;o)
I'm still getting used to Echo Show 5.But I like that I can check the weather and the time instantly.
