On my third one. First one started getting garbled. They send me a refurb that wouldn't complete bootup. Third one started to get garbled two weeks after I received it. Now they want me to send it in for a repair.

Pro: Works as advertised, have used it for a month
The physical camera lens cover makes me much more comfortable putting it in my home.
Fun to use to watch videos lying in bed, I have to have noise to sleep.

Cons: while it can do some things with the screen, it’s limited by the screen size & interface.

Doesn't do as much as I thought it would and some devices seem to have issues with it but I did manage to reconnect it to the devices I have and has been ok now for over a week. I will let you know if I have more issues with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Better than any radio or alarm clock systems that I've had.
reviews.reviewText: Love the compact size that fits comfortably on my nightstand. The night setting is excellent and the day phase vibrant. A great sound system in such a small package. I can also monitor my outdoor camer5with a simple request.

works as expected. though the screen is small, it's worth having if you're looking for totally integration to alexa. you can view the camera and communicate to/through it remotely. something you can't do with a fire tablet, with alexa.

Bought this for amazon prime day. The only thing I really use it for is as a webcam I can connect to on my phone. I just click on the Alexa app and I am able to see my living room and communicate with whoever is here at the time. Other then that it doesn’t get used.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for Face-to-Face communication and good Value
reviews.reviewText: Finally a voice computer with a nice deep noise speaker that’s affordable. I haven’t reached to the edges of the technology behind it yet, but looking forward to photo-frame integration amongst other things on my new LCD voice comp.

reviews.reviewTitle: A Lot in a Small Format
reviews.reviewText: Works well as advertised. Still exploring its many features, but so far, all exceeds expectations.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works just perfect does everything the show does
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this echo mini, does everything the show does. Just about the size of a cellphone, perfect size for my kitchen

It works great I usually use it to check the time and weather at a glance, on occasion music and some of the other features. The speaker is definitely more powerful than the dot.

It seems to have no issues communicating with my Plex server (just takes a bit to set up), and works great with Ring.

reviews.reviewTitle: It works more than I expected
reviews.reviewText: Works absolutely fantastic and it helps me forget the fact that I'm alone since at certain times I make Alexa show me affection, like a couple minutes after when i usually get home from grade school, i have alexa welcome me home and at music after, and before school she tells me goodmorning and plays the news for me to listen to

Got it to work with my Arlo cameras. Set up routines to notify me of motion on the cameras. OK for camera live view. Next to impossible to get it to play back last motion recording. Have to issue the command just right and be lucky.

For the price, this is a great upgrade from Echo dots. I wanted a screen, and it serves the purpose. The negatives - screen is smaller than I had imagined, not much bigger than a cell phone, and the speaker is pretty lousy.

Hope this finds Amazon. Curious the point of voice recognition if everyone in my house can use my contacts. My daughter can call people on my contact list. Additionally, household members can see my contacts on the show. Need a way to only use contacts for the account and voice being recognized as well as not displaying them in the echo show. Privacy

The Echo Show was easy to set up. It's a perfect companion to my original Echo. I have this in my bedroom. I love that you can turn and camera and the sound off at night. The sound is good. I'm very happy with this.

I like the echo show 5, but I don’t find myself using the video that often. I expected there to a be a lot of additional video integrations, but there are not. I got mine during prime days so it’s not that big of a deal that I’m not using it as much as I had hoped.

For 50$ This is pretty cool, from using it, it seems to have a little better sound than the normal 3rd gen Dot. It is basically just a Dot, but I had no idea that it plays Prime Video shows, that that was an amazing discovery, as I could just, pause the show I'm watching, go to my kitchen, ask it to resume, and it plays where I left off. (Well, like 20 seconds behind)
If you like an item that can’t understand anything you say and just shows adds, this is for you

Love the new Show 5. We have every Alexa device that's come out and this is one of my favorites based on cost, size, features and more. The sound is incredible and outperforms most Bluetooth speakers we've tried. In fact, I've grouped several Alexa devices together to form a very nice surround sound effect when I'm playing music.

This seemed like a good upgrade to my 1st generation echo show bit the screen is smaller than the screen on my galaxy note 8. It may work for a side table or night stand but dont expect to see anything from across the room.
This is an awesome device, my kids loves it. Clear voice, nice sound

We are an Amazon household all the way, so we love Alexa and the Echo devices. We got this on prime day for $50 and are really happy with it! First of all you can customize your home screen, which is nice. It also has a plastic piece that slides over the camera. Sound quality is good and I don't mind the smaller screen.

reviews.reviewTitle: Another fine Edition to the Amazon Echo Platform
reviews.reviewText:
Alexa & I have a complex relationship: Lol
i usually buy items that are Shipped & Sold by Amazon
Amazon Echo devices are a wonderful item to add to your home
not recommended for Medical HIPPA environments
Love it. Great. I should had waited and got it cheap. Still love ot.
It looks nice and does everything the large one does. I wish the sound quality was better.

This was a gifted to me and I wish it wasn’t. It is a glorified alarm clock with little use other than telling me the time and weather. It fails to sync with Spotify with the Alexa app so I have to Bluetooth it every time. I love amazon logistical services but tablets and smart software are clearly not their forté. Don’t even get me started on the jeopardy app.

This is a great upgrade from the basic Alexa speaker. It's nice to be able to ask Alexa to show you things instead of just speaking out answers. Really like the video call feature as well. It makes a great clock when not in use for other things as well.

I bought this for my husband. We already had two Echo Shows that we loved, and thought to try this new echo as well. The screen is smaller, but the colors just pop out at you! It is easy to see writing and scenes on the screen. It is also compact and fits nicely on a crowded desk. We bought the stand as well. It allows us to adjust the screen for maximum enjoyment.
I replaced my alarm clock with the Echo Show 5 - it's awesome. Sound is excellent. Nice way to wake up...

reviews.reviewTitle: Never opened, it's just too small, grt for teen.
reviews.reviewText: I didnt give it any stars because I didnt get far after opening the box. It is listed as "compact" but sheesh it is very small. My phone screen is bigger! So as quick as it came, same day on Sunday, it left just as quickly the following day. So Stars couldn't be given fairly. It is very cute, lite & small so good for a teen or pre-teens room or college dorm so it's at a good price w/5mth easy pay right now so maybe start Christmas shopping? Got nothing else for ya here, but hopefully it helps someone who thinking of getting. Have a good day.
Love it’s simplicity. Easy to set up. It just works. Love being able to view my ring door bell right on the screen.

I bought this on Prime day, so while the price was right, the sound quality on this isn't great. More so with music, than i.e. Alexa just talking to you. I was thinking of getting the bigger one down the road, but not sure I will now.
This is the best gadget I ever bought hands down don’t think I can live without out it now love it

Very cool and informative. Sound quality is real good. Would like to see it have more versatility with integrating more Alexa enabled devices. Tried to connect it to my Alexa enabled TV and it's a no go; even after researching how to do it.

I love this thing. Its so useful. From using it as an extra front door monitor (Ring skill) to looking at recipes, this thing does everything. I really love that there is a physical button to cover the camera too.

I purchased this primarily as a handy display for use with our Ring doorbell. It works very well at that task. Alexa integration is nice, although I predominately use our Google Home for answering questions, etc.

reviews.reviewTitle: Much better than the Echo Spot and Cheaper
reviews.reviewText: The Echo spot is cool but the round design limits really what it can do well. It doesn't show lyrics or other things very well. This is a much better device IMO. Has better sound, better video, and cheaper. No brainier.

Loved my original echo and with moving into a new house, decided to get a second one for the bedroom. Easy to ask questions an it integrates with my security system. I can ask it to show me the front door and speak to the person.

I bought this for my mom to replace a nightstand clock. I also bought one of the amazon smart plugs to go with this purchase. She couldn't be happier with the ease of use or the quality and its perfect for just what she wants to do.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love the ability to close the camera port
reviews.reviewText: I like the ability to close the camera port and the touch screen. Calling up my Arlo cams is a great feature. The size is just right for table side. The speaker is better than the dot but not as good as the Echo. I’m thinking about getting another.

Another nice product from Amazon. I wanted to get the Show, but when when this went on sale, couldn't resist. This works great as an alarm clock replacement. Sound is perfect for the bedroom and perfect for guest bedroom.

I love this thing. I downloaded the ring “app” for Alexa and Alexa announces whenever someone is at my door. Then I can ask Alexa to show me the front door and I can see who’s there before opening the door. Love it!

Excellent product and design. I use it as my alarm clock and it's worked exactly the way I expected. I read some reviews saying the snooze function wasn't working for some users but I haven't had any issues. Overall I'm very pleased with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Neat convenient version of the full size Echo Show for the bedroom
reviews.reviewText: Nice addition and full replacement of our alarm clock and weather clock. Answers all of our questions and marries easily to our Insteon family of smart switches and controls. Easy communications with our Ecobee 4 thermostat
The Echo Show 5 is a great addition to my bedroom. It does about everything my bigger Echo Show does. It's the right size for my nightstand. It's already replaced my alarm clock and radio.

reviews.reviewTitle: I love it Showing me everything
reviews.reviewText: I don't care about it listening to me, I am glad something does. I needed it to show me the front door with my ring doorbell and it does that and so much more, I wish I had bought 2. I would love to have them in my room and by the front patio. Great product highly recommend it. Works with all my cameras and alexa's perfectly

reviews.reviewTitle: Will not buy for this reason
reviews.reviewText: Very disappointed. Bought to video with parent at work. Has NEVER worked. Usually happy with amazon products but cant seem to get the echo show to do video. I have googled videos, articles, etc to get echo show to work for me. Nada!

reviews.reviewTitle: Sophisticated and Useful Alarm Radio with Alexa
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a replacement to an old nightstand radio/alarm clock. The Echo Show 5 does the job beautifully. Small enough not to be obtrusive, but large and clear enough to be viewed from across the room. Perfect for my purposes.

Sounds are best on the larger Alexa Show but it’s still pretty good on this smaller one. It does pretty much any of the other Alexa’ s do. I placed this one in our master so was glad camera can be closed. I love the clock
Connected with security cameras easily as well as with sound bars to amplify sound. A real bargain

We already had the First generation Alexa, This one isn't as loud as original, but still has good sound, the original has sound quality like Bose speaker technology, this one doesn't, I didn't buy the stand and find I didn't need it. I like how it works with my ring doorbell, and gives me the lyrics to songs, great for recipes too another great product from Amazon. Thank you

Took advantage of a special by amazon and was able to update from an old Echo dot to an Echo Show 5 for under $30. I was a great upgrade and integrated seamlessly with my other devices. Thanks you Amazon for the upgrade opportunity.

reviews.reviewTitle: Got a good deal, so I'm pretty happy.
reviews.reviewText: I got this thing on prime day for $50 so I'm pretty happy with it. Don't use the the show part of it too much but it's kind of cool to watch quick videos or even browse some sites or you tube on. Works pretty good with price video too.

Love it! Still learning skills! I set reminders all the time! I’ll set a reminder to tell me kids something when I’m not there! I use it a lot when doing laundry. Alexa remind me to get the clothes out! I get laundry done faster!

I bought one of these last week for our kitchen. I have used it to listen to music, as a clock, and to ask Alexa some cooking questions. The sound quality is good for the size and price, I'm very happy with it! I am so happy with it, I tried to purchase another one to use in our bedroom as my alarm clock today! Only to find the device is $25 higher this week than last week!?!?! What's with the inconsistent pricing Amazon? If it was the same price I would buy another, but no way and I'm spending that much more!

My most favorite echo so far! Sits right on my desk and have not been disappointed. I saw some people complain about advertising but I don’t gave that problem. I get the headlines and occasional tips on how to teach Alexa a new skill but all around a great device!

You'll needed to try it l love my new Echo Show 5 . I love everything on it l love everything on my Kindles and Amazon.com . I love look and shopping on Amazon.com . Thanks again.D
Love,
Patty Thilman

I was in need of a new radio in my bath/dressing area along with a clock,this is perfect. Love I can ask questions,(weather, etc..) Sound is pretty good for its size.I am happy with this. Bought a couple for gifts

Before last night I would have given it 5 stars, but during the night Alexa said "Hello" twice. On the screen it looked like a cartoon polar bear waving. I told it to stop, but had to bring up the controls and tap it to go to home screen.

reviews.reviewTitle: First Echo Show for us and works as expected
reviews.reviewText: We got this unit just out of the spur of the moment, but since we have integrated it to our home, we have now built an automated home that is a command away. I have also watched some television on it. Great little device

We using this as an alarm clock and are quite enjoying it. Love that it automatically dims at night. Also love the flexibility of setting different alarms for different days. No more forgetting to turn the alarm off on the weekend and getting woken up!

I bought two of these. They are a great addition to my current Alexa collection. Very easy to set up. The sound is great. The pictures are crisp. Alexa is a member of the family! We are going to buy several more and give them as Christmas gifts. The information is endless! Excellent product!

reviews.reviewTitle: Does not recognize voice half the time...
reviews.reviewText: ...does not come on without several times shouting "Alexa" and has difficulty understanding commands (as compared to dots and show). Very nice compact unit to fit on nightstand - camera off for privacy unless having conversation with another show unit. Sound is a bit blurred, but acceptable.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is a great clock so far.
reviews.reviewText: The echo show 5 completely exceeds my expectations so far. I'm very impressed. My main gripe is the fact that one cannot turn off the endless suggestions of things to try with any show device. That irritates me greatly.

So, I bought two and created a stereo sub pair group with an Echo Sub. That way, I have left and right separation and the bass added that these don’t natively have. Works awesome as my wife and I have our own alarm clocks, but still have great audio for music.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice addition to the Echo family
reviews.reviewText: Had the Echo Spot as my alarm clock but sometime the time was hard to see. This is the perfect size for an alarm clock. Function well as an Alexa device. Good picture quality when using it in a call situation.

reviews.reviewTitle: It works fine integrated with Amazon
reviews.reviewText: It works fine integrated with Amazon, but for getting searchable info, I prefer the Google Home products, s well as Google's often funnier responses. The Echo show definitely has the advantage of having a display though.

I absolutely love the Amazon Echo Show 5 with stand. It is a beautifully built product and the functionality is unparalleled. I have not been let down by the continued excellence Amazon pumps out on the daily!

reviews.reviewTitle: Does not pick up voice nearly as well as ALL of the other echo devices I have
reviews.reviewText: I have the first, second and third generations of the dot, the first gen echo, an echo spot, and even briefly use the echo show. THIS DOES NOT PICK UP MY VOICE without silencing everything in the room and yelling.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Device for adding to your Echo Network
reviews.reviewText:
Perfect screen size for an alarm clock and quick video chat. The sound is decent but I like the Echo sound better. It was easy to set up and become part of my Echo “Ring of Fire” : )
couldn’t be the Amazon Day price of $49

I really love my echo show 5. Having it next the bed makes for a great bed side clock. its ability to scroll information such as the weather, my calendar, and sports scores makes it very easy to stay up to date on things. the night mode feature of the clock is great it makes unit dark enough so I can sleep yet bright enough to still see the clock from my bed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Need to replace all my Dots !
reviews.reviewText: I replaced a Dot with this when I caught it on sale. I am very pleased with the display and integration. I am going to be replacing two more Dots with this to have the option of seeing things on the screen.

reviews.reviewTitle: Do not touch or she will not stop alarm by voice
reviews.reviewText: Turning off an alarm that you have snoozed by touch is a nightmare. Every day it takes a different phrase and half the time the alarm has to be re-programed. If you snooze by voice everything works as expected

Really enjoying the Alexa Show. Still learning about all the things it can do but find it very helpful showing recipes, temperatures, time etc. So fun learning every day something new. This is my fifth echo and my first Alexa Show. Very satisfied!
I really like Echo Show 5. Good price and very innovative device.

Doesn't work very well and really doesn't do much. Most of its answers are I don't know that and I can't do that. It can give you the temperature and and a news blurb but other than that its just an expensive alarm clock.

The equalizer settings has bass, mid, and treble. I have the treble all the way up, and zero on the mid and treble. The Alexa voice is still so deep that it's hard to understand. Come on, Amazon, how about a firmware fix? Please?

Much smaller than you'd expect. Perfect for a bedside! Looking to get the bigger model for the living room. Or the echo studio. But this model is perfect for a bedside device, and gaming and audio quality is perfect on it!

I love this little device. It sets on my nightstand and does everything I expected it to do. The screen is very clear, and the sound quality is very good for a small device. We’re thinking of getting one for the kitchen as well.

While I a happy with my purchase, I am disappointed that Hulu is available on the Echo Show, but some how not compatible with the Show 5. If they figure out the issue and get it working, this could be a 5 star rating.

I bought this for my nest camera system and because I needed a Alexa in the living room. Works with all the cameras but does not pull up the door bell camera automatically if someone rings it. Also I don't know if you can get all the advertisements off it so it's just a clock when your not using it.

Very annoying, the screen is always moving and trying to show you advertisements. There is probably a way to turn that function off, but I just can’t be bothered. I pre-ordered this device and paid the full price just 30 days before prime day where these were sold for much less. Needless to say I’m not thrilled with this purchase. The speaker does sound much better than a dot though.

I was an early adopter of the first Echo and now have an Echo Plus as well as several Echo Dots and now this Echo Show 5. I couldn't be more satisfied with all of them. The Echo Show 5 replaced the clock radio on my nightstand.

reviews.reviewTitle: Once you use the echo show you want and a go back to a standard
reviews.reviewText: This is my second Echo Show as purchased, I like them a lot okay. A Netflix app would be perfect though, that really takes away from some of the glamour of the unit not being able to watch Netflix call flashlight only being able to watch Amazon Prime.

I found it well worth it. Alexa is welcoming voice when getting up in the morning by greeting me with the day's info. And a quip. The display is large enough to watch a youtube video for making a cake or something.

reviews.reviewTitle: Like having a good friend in your home !
reviews.reviewText:
This unit is really great. Except wished I had gotten the 10" one so I could see the screen even better.
After getting the Echo for the living area, sure am enjoying this 5" video Alexa in the bed room! rg.

overall i'm happy with my purchase .. i like a lot about this devise, however i did not realize that it did not come with a rechargeable battery .. guess i just assumed it did, so am a little disappointed about that .. (FYI i also bought an amazon dot, same comments apply to that devise as well)

There's nothing I don't like. Feels solid without feeling too heavy/light or cheap looking. Nice size and clear screen. I would buy another.
"things to try" doesn't bother me much, complaining won't fix the problems anyway lol

I bought this for my nursery and use it as a very fancy baby monitor without paying the price for a very fancy baby monitor. It helped our son fall asleep and sleep through the night using it as a sleep sound machine.

I got this to work with a Ring for my wife while she is in the office. Works pretty much as expected. I would have liked it to have a little more functions with the Ring such as the ability to look at the saved motions but it appears to just be able to look at the live view and answer the doorbell. Good enough for what I got it for.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great as a bedroom alarm clock
reviews.reviewText: Love how it dims the screen at night. I wish the larger Echo Show did that too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product to help make things simple
reviews.reviewText: Product is great for kitchen use and very simple to setup. So many features to use with other Alexa enabled devices and especially when this devices are so cheap. Makes this a definite buy if your on the fence on making your home a smart home

I love it so much! Don’t think about getting it just get it! Lol it’s just a really neat piece of technology that will help in your everyday lives if that’s just asking about what the weather or just simply turning off lights in my house. Just amazing and worth every bit that I paid.

I use it alot in the morning when I am getting ready for work.
The plug stinks if you are plugging it into a strip because it hogs two slots. :(
Disappointed that it often does not play my whole playlist that I have on Prime.

I do love the echo show and love the drop in feature. Works great for having recipes right at your fingertips without scrolling through your phone. I think this is a must have. Great for dropping in and checking on the kids too.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's Alexa but not as you know her
reviews.reviewText: Yes this is a great addition to my collection. The screen is perfect for the kitchen for looking at recipes or just watching a movie instead of watching the kettle boil. It comes in handy and I do recommend it.

To be honest I haven't used many of the features due to lack of time but what I have used it for it has been true to the roll out hype. the unit is receptive and the images very sharp. If you tend to be more of a visual person it would probably satisfy you.

reviews.reviewTitle: Directions given in easy to understand language.
reviews.reviewText: I like that I can get recipes on the screen and Alexa tells me the instructions in step by step detail and will repeat any that I need to hear again. I like being able to call my daughter and see her while I am talking to her.
Really like the visual piece. Mounted to my right at eyeball level = Perfect for me!

It does work which is why I give two stars although it lacks a quick response design. It takes way too much time when swiping or trying to select any function on the device. It’s extremely delayed and doesn’t respond with even an adequate amount of delay. It needs to definitely improve. I’ve contemplated returning it but it’s more hassle then it’s worth. The next edition hopefully is as quick as an iOS device. The windows and slow processor speeds I thought were behind us. It’s a great idea but maybe Amazon should partner with Apple to run their devises.
Echo Show 5 is perfect for any room. I’ve read some reviews complaining about the sound, but I think it has a great speaker for its compact size. Affordable to have in multiple rooms.

I absolutely love Alexa I use her every day when I wake up when I’m going to bed and throughout the day when I’m home. Are use Alexa to turn on and off my lights and activate my cameras to view was going on outside when I’m inside I absolutely love it

reviews.reviewTitle: Works great for what I needed.
reviews.reviewText: I use the echo for varies things and it does vary well with what I wanted it for. The only draw back is all the different things that scroll on the screen unless you disable them. I'd still recommend to buy it at the price .

reviews.reviewTitle: Has all the features of the bigger version and more
reviews.reviewText: It is small and compact and planning to take it on my upcoming trip

reviews.reviewTitle: The Echo family of devices are great!
reviews.reviewText: The Echo Show 5 was easy to setup and add to my AMAZON & Internet Network. The sound is incredible and it’s just a mini Echo Show! I use it in my kitchen for music, cooking, video chats and more. Being able to add to my shopping list as things come to my mind, reminders, set alarms and view cameras from almost any public rooms in my house is amazing!! Their is so much more you can do to make life so much enjoyable, I love them! My grand children like them, also! Echo Show is the first one that I purchased for my bedroom. I started out with the Echo Dot.

reviews.reviewTitle: Be wary about what you have bought.
reviews.reviewText:
Very muffled sound, when it was working. Also, blue bar at the bottom, then replaced with a purple and nothing more happened. For a few days, the video was great when giving me the news update, then all was silent and without a picture. Bragged on it to my husband- then didnt work.
Replaced it with Echo dot, which works beautifully.

This version is my favorite echo. It's a great size for bedroom or bathroom. It provides a jack that allows you to easily connect it to external speakers. Very versatile and good overall size and function.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best Alexa I have ever owned
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for someone not as expensive and it has a screen I would definitely buy this

reviews.reviewTitle: If you are looking for good sound, try something else.
reviews.reviewText: Very disappointed. I have an Echo, Dot and Show and just added the Show 5. The Show 5 audio quality, especially for voice is quite bad. The Dot is even much better. The equalizer (Treble, Mids, Bass) apparently does nothing at all. Using an external bluetooth speaker is a great improvement, but now I have two devices on my nightstand.

reviews.reviewTitle: RING compatible - just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: The Echo Show 5 works nicely with my RING doorbell. I wanted a countertop display so that I am not having to look for my phone when there is activity at my door and I am at home. I am pleased with screen size and the clarity. Set up was easy. I have made phone calls using this device, listened to music, performed inquiries, etc. I am very pleased with this purchase.

I would not recommend, and whatever you do, DO NOT CALL AMAZON TECH SUPPORT. They are absolutely the worst people to ever deal. If you think your cell phone tech support ppl are bad, you've never had to deal with the Echo tech team. Pray you don't have a problem if you buy the Echo Show 5.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great value with all the same features as a full size Show.
reviews.reviewText: We have a full size Show in our kitchen. This one is the perfect size for an office or bedroom. All the same features. Setup and integration with all our existing groups and routines could not have been easier.

Maybe we got a "dud" but this thing fails to work a thousand times over. We keep having to restart it and reset it and unplug and plug it back in; it really is more hassle than it's worth. Disappointing.

Really loving our Echo Show! This is the first one we have tried and were unsure how much we would actually use it. However, it had been a huge hit with all the family members! I love it for making lists and reminders!

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect size for a crowded desk.
reviews.reviewText: Great to have on my home office desk. I can drop in on other parts of the house, control my smart devices and read the words to the music that I am listening to.

This is an amazing product - it was unbelievably easy to set up, the sound quality is amazing, and it works like a charm. If you have an Echo Dot and love it - get one of these little gems - you'll be in love all over again.

It's okay. Doesn't seem like the voice recognition is as good as the Echo Dot. Still haven't been able to synchronize it with my Blink camera; app just won't work right. Submitted multiple customer service requests with no response.

reviews.reviewTitle: "Alexa I didnt want to know how to eat pizza in the shower" 🤣
reviews.reviewText: Can be a bit to responsive, but hey that's Alexa for ya, the sound quility on it blows me away comparing other alexa speakers it has amazing bass and sound quility for its size. It astounds me every day

We love this! Our Echo show first gen was getting glitchy, so we decided to try the Show 5... it’s soooooo much smaller, even the screen size, but better quality in sound and pictures! The kids love doing karaoke along with this 😉

Bought this smaller Echo Show after reading that you can communicate between two Echoes. I had received my 10” Echo and was able to order the second smaller one, 5” after my original delivery and before Prime Day pricing ended. Also serves as s great bedside clock and controller of bedroom lighting. Win-win!
I received the echo as a gift. All my sons have done is play with it for the last 10 days. Driving me crazy!
Easy to use, great display. Much better than the echo dots. My family loves them.

the latest show is very poor, it has poor voice recognition, much worse than it's old version, which never had a problem recognize my commands, don't buy this!
The sound sucks & is very tinny.
I willl be returning it.

We have it in the kitchen and love it for many reasons. The list making, playing music, showing pictures and the timers. And it controls the lights throughout the house. Would buy again in a heartbeat.

I love the Alexa apps. Being able to communicate within the home as well as video call friends and family. Next I will start adding smart items to my home.
For a hoot say "Alexa, I am your father"

reviews.reviewTitle: Fantastic quality for an amazing price
reviews.reviewText: I have the Echo Dot, Echo Spot and now the Echo Show and I love it! This product still has a few hiccups but I expect they will be worked out over time but I am MORE than pleased with the Echo Show!

What a great addition to my Echo Family. I just can't get enough Echo products in my home. I love the assistance that Echo has provided my busy life. Thank you Alexa for all you do for me. And I just love the sound quality, especially when playing music, which I do allot!

Have integrated music to every room in my house. This is hooked up to 1 on the inputs and I just tell it what to play @nd that music is available in every room. Great display and not too big for the end table.

reviews.reviewTitle: In the case of the echo show. Bigger is better.
reviews.reviewText: The echo 5 show was what I wanted until I got it. Then I realized that by spending a bit more I would have got a better buy. I use the show for my door bell camera as well as the clock feature and speaker. But initially it was just for the clock and speaker. So if you have cameras buy the larger screen because I have to get a bit closer to see who is at the door with this one.

reviews.reviewTitle: All In All a Great Device
reviews.reviewText:
Wish there was the ability to change the clock number colors
And more background choices

reviews.reviewTitle: Enjoying my start of a smart home

If you don't want it for video it is a good device, though. Sound is much better than my dot.
I bought this to replace an Echo Spot. I like the large display which I leave in clock mode. It is clearly readable from a distance. Bought on Amazon Prime Day at an attractive price. Very satisfied.

I have had an Alexa since the very first one came out and have a few dots in other places in the house. This is the first Alexa that I have bought with a screen and so far it is working out great and my family enjoys using it too.

The bass out of this speaker is non-existent. I tried to play some Tool and had to turn it off bc it sounded terrible. Previously I had a 1st gen show, and it was a bit boomy but i could adjust it. Even with the bass and mids maxed out, there was no bass.

Other than that, it’s your typical Echo.

The screen is about the size of the largest Galaxy.

reviews.reviewTitle: The Echo Show 5 is a great household tool
reviews.reviewText: We use near the kitchen as a timer for cooking, provides recipes on demand, gives use weather updates in seconds, provides music during our cooking moments. It's a step above the other Echo products.

We bought this during Prime Days and have loved it since it was delivered. Great sound, good picture detail, BUT an owner's manual would have been nice to help with setup, especially setting the alarm.

Bought this on prime day and I love it. It plays as a loud speaker, makes calls, pulls up recipes, turns lights on and off, and play music. The only complaint I have would be that it has a small screen could be bigger.

Love the addition of a video screen to what is normally just an Alexa. But in many ways it make it superior and allows for video playback of music, cooking, Youtube and other stuff. The speaker is really good as well.
The sound quality is amazing and it doesn’t take up a lot of space but the screen is large enough and very easy to read. I highly recommend this device.

Great alarm clock. Because of the lack of customization, it doesn’t make a good smart home hub. You can make any tablet a better hub than the echo show. I do like the device and it’s nice to have Alexa next to the bed with an alarm clock built in.

I was reluctant to replace my alarm clock that I have had for many years. This, so far, has been perfect. I can ask for a Weather or when business is open, and it is always right.Plus, it controls my whole home. I can turn on lights and turn them off with minimal effort.

reviews.reviewTitle: The BEST, Love this Alexa echo the best.
reviews.reviewText: Echo Show's speakers are as strong as my Echo Plus and I absolutely Love the screen, where Alexa is continually visually showing you suggestions on what to ask her to do. AMAZING and a must have!

The only reason it gets a 4 star is because we all know Alexa gets a little mouthy at weird times haha. Totally worth the money. I was skeptical on the screen size but it’s definitely adequate. And YES you can turn off the suggested apps and scrolling home screen (so it will just sit on the clock).
Works great as an alarm clock next to my bed. Switched the camera off so Alexa doesn't watch me sleeping. That would be creepy, but then again she's recording what I say in my sleep.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for bedroom but too small for kitchen.
reviews.reviewText: I’ll keep it brief since theres already a ton of reviews. Was smaller than i expected. Will not replace full size Echo Show, but more usable than Echo Spot. Perfect for bedroom but too small for kitchen.
I like the form factor of this device. With a display added, Alexa becomes even more useful. Like the message flashing and analog clock on the display. Video calling feature makes it so much nicer.

I purchase the Echo Show 5 on Prime Day for a good price and I love it! It connected right away. The sound is awesome and the display is vibrant too! This is a nice addition to my already bigger Echo Show and Spot.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound and very clear little screen.
reviews.reviewText: Replaced a little Echo Dot with this in the Bathroom. (Turned off the camera, of coarse.) The sound quality is so much better and I like how I can view my Ring Cameras on the little screen. Because of this, I wish I could get this with about a 12inch screen to monitor my Ring Cameras and maybe act as a photo frame. Love it! Just offer a bigger model.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to integrate with phone app
reviews.reviewText: Replaced an early Echo Show that stopped working. The Show 5 was very easy to set up and add to the Alexa app on my android phone. The smaller Show 5 fits better on a lamp table beside my favorite recliner.

reviews.reviewTitle: Awesome sounds quality, wish it had a hard snooze button
reviews.reviewText:
Awesome sound quality out of this little device. Now I can see who's at the door through my Ring Doorbell 2 from this.
Wish it had a dedicated snooze button. Sometimes I've hit the Dismiss button instead of snooze and overslept.
A fun little gadget with a nice screen a decent speakers. Very handy

reviews.reviewTitle: If voice recognition actually worked, this would be a good product.
reviews.reviewText: After two days the voice recognition does not work. I purchased this unit as a bedside clock and music player. I cannot turn the alarm off by voice. The concept is good but the execution is not!

The camera did not work on this device so had to spend a lot of time on the phone with customer service figuring out how to fix the camera. Turns out the device needed a hard reset and the initial set up to make it work.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love this device next to my bed but....
reviews.reviewText: I really like the features that Echo show has. It has been great next to my bed. However, the speaker is really muffled. I am in the process of sending it back. I will follow up once I receive the new one back.
I love using it for recipes. I also like seeing the time and temp. It is the perfect size.

reviews.reviewTitle: Try it for yourself some complaints are preference and not the capability of the product.
reviews.reviewText:
I love it! I use and enjoy it more than I thought I would.
I see a lot of complaints about ads, I've not seen ads, just suggestions of Alexa's capabilities. And I didn't find it to be a problem.
My only complaint is that sometimes I have to repeat myself on this one and it doesn't connect to my Bluetooth speakers. I have several of the Amazon devices and I love them all! I recommend them to all of my family and friends. I am waiting to get the echo show 8 now.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great addition to the Echo family
reviews.reviewText: Love being able to use voice and touch commands. Screen auto dims at night to resemble your basic digital alarm clock with red numbers. Reuters skill gives video news briefs. Browse the web is also an option. You can also watch Amazon Prime videos! Love seeing my doorbell and cameras on screen. Got it on Prime Day. Very happy with my purchase.

Not quite to happy with this about every 3 days she loses my screen on the home screen and I have to reboot her. She loses focus on my alarms and don’t ring or sound at times I have gotten up late for work several times since I got this device.
Love the sound and the screen size is just perfect for a bedroom

She's perfect! Great size. Much better sound quality than the spot has. I liked the spot, but this is so much better. Better screen size, better sound. Definitely love the ability to turn the camera off with a manual switch.

reviews.reviewTitle: Needs a stand and it would be five stars...
reviews.reviewText: I would give it five stars but this thing should come with an adjustable stand....The camera is useless without it. Other than the stand it’s pretty cool and set up was super easy!

My sister's and I all came together to get this for our mom for Christmas. I already have it set up and ready! We can't wait for her to open it! It's really user friendly! Now I'm going to have to get myself one!

I bought the Show 5 during Prime Days. It is the perfect size for my kitchen counter. It doesn’t take up much space. I am able to see my blink cameras (another Prime Day purchase), my Ring doorbell, any created list, calendar and operate my Hue lights. It’s nice to have video available at voice command. I love it.

Replaced a first generation show.
Pros: Smaller size, better resolution screen, more secure camera
Cons: Less responsive to voice with background noise present (small microphone array)

reviews.reviewTitle: Video stop working any fter 2 months
reviews.reviewText:
Bought on prime day to have video calls with my son. He bought 3. Video worked great for 2 months and the stopped. Can’t find any help only others who have same problem....lots of others.
Why bother buying it for video conversations when it stops working and Amazon ignores finding a fix.

UPDATE: within a couple of hours of posting this review, Amazon tech help called. They helped me find a solution to my problem and helped my son figure his out at the same time. BEST service I have had in YEARS!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: microphone response is significantly worse then on the echo dot 2nd gen.
reviews.reviewText: its an okay device but the mic has trouble picking up my voice, even over the sound of a desk fan. Perhaps I have a faulty unit but my echo dot 2 in the other room often hears me before the echo show that's in the same room as me.
Love it! Sound is amazing and does everything the echo show does and more. Highly recommend!

She's so dumb compared to Google Home. She's almost unusable.

"Alexa find BBQ chicken recipe"

"Ok you chose Batman Adventure, playing now"

What????
I got it primarily for allrecipe app so I could display recipe without having to open iPad. Screen too small and the voice commands aren’t working as well as I would like. But still happy to have it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product at an more than reasonable price!
reviews.reviewText: I have so many different Echos that I didn't expect this "baby" Show to be anything but basic. I was pleasantly surprised how great it was! I put one in our guestroom and gave another as a gift.

reviews.reviewTitle: I love the show and tell feature!
reviews.reviewText: I have several echos through out our home, but I really enjoy the echo show as it not only gives information, but allows you to see the information also. I keep it in my kitchen beside my laptop. That way I can monitor the weather, just by a glance. A really good buy from Amazon on prime day!
We replaced an Echo Dot with this Echo Show 5. Much larger screen area and the sound quality from the speaker is excellent. Integrates perfectly with our Smart Home (and other Alexa devices). NICE!!

This is my second show. I had the origin was was far superior to this. I grant you this is much smaller but you almost have to yell at it to get a response. Not good. I will give it 4 stars for being an alarm clock

Privacy issues aside... the Echo Show 5 is perfect for a bedside night stand. The shutter block means no one can drop in while you’re in bed. The ability for the device to hear very soft Alexa requests is amazing. I am someone that never wanted one and I am sold. A welcome addition to my family of IOT devices.

I'm using this baby in my bedroom as an alarm clock, to play music and for all of the same reasons I use my regular Echos. I like that there's a screen. It sounds terrific. I'm really glad I brought it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Microphone is terrible, the rest is a solid 3
reviews.reviewText: This is by no means an upgrade. You have to really shout for it to hear you about 15 feet away. Microphone gets 1 Star, the rest of it a solid 3. It’s decent, but it wasn’t worth trading my 1st gen Alexa which was still in excellent condition.

reviews.reviewTitle: It’s small and compact and the sound is excellent!
reviews.reviewText: I bought it specifically to work with my ring doorbell, and it does do that I can answer the door using Alexa and show the front door as advertised. Although I do think that in the future Amazon should allow all of the Eccles to answer the front door whether you can view the individual or not that would be good for safety purposes.

reviews.reviewTitle: if my 4 year old says "alexa, play Baby Shark" one....more....time.......
reviews.reviewText: I wish there was a way to block my sons voice. I absolutely love this though. I haven't had much of a chance to experience all of the benefits but what I have has been amazing so far.

reviews.reviewTitle: great sound and easy to set up
reviews.reviewText: Really glad I got the Echo Show 5. Is that sweet size right between the Spot and the Show. Great on my night stand and I can check our Blink cameras without having to reach my phone and unplug it at night if I hear something.

Just an overpriced clock that does about the same you get amazon and alexa but she is not very smart and can not understand simple english.

Thanks for wasting my time Ama

We have a Ring doorbell and got this so we could see who is at the door instead of looking for a cellphone. It does a great job. It also works great with our original Alexa device - I was worried they would both try to do the same thing if they heard "Alexa..."
Glad we purchased.
This is my second Echo Show. I have one of the older versions that's much larger. Both work great but this new one is so nice and compact, that I feel it's superior to the old one.

This is just as good as all my other shows but in a compact size to fit on my little table.
UPDATE: Don't buy. Not even 3 months and it doesn't work. I've made one call and asked it a few questions and the speaker is shot.

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazon Has A Winner With This One.
reviews.reviewText: I really like this Echo Show 5. I use it next to my bed for an alarm clock. But it does much more. You can watch Amazon Prime Video on it. Music, etc. The sound is good for the size. I'm glad I bought it.

I replaced my Echo Spot. This too can be used as a smart alarm clock. Just wished it would have had stereo speakers. I have the second generation Show in my living room. The first in my kitchen. I just wanted a condensed version of the Show 2.0 for my nightstand. That's all.
I love the video part of this device. I love the fact that I can pull up a recipe in seconds and see everything I need! Everything else is great too but that is my favorite part!

reviews.reviewTitle: Good sound for music but does not pick up your voice as well as the other Amazon products
reviews.reviewText: My biggest gripe is that it seems as though I have to yell at this product for it to hear me say the wake-up word, Alexia. All my other Echo Dots have no issues with hearing my voice. The second-gen Echo Dot that it replaced did a better job of hearing my voice.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ability to operate device from app is perfect!
reviews.reviewText: I love this echo! Placed in my elderly parents home but linked to my account. I can drop in or set reminders anytime from my app. They can get phone numbers easy and ask about weather.
This is the best Echo product I’ve gotten so far. It allows me to see my Ring doorbell camera from my bedroom.

reviews.reviewTitle: I works well for a but not for understanding or hearing
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't always hear me and when it does it doesn't understand what I say my echo 3rd gen a newer working much better for hearing and understanding have thought about returning it
Keeps me entertained while I cook.
Very happy, satisfied, and content with this product! I recommend it!

This Echo Show 5 drops wireless conncectivity about 1 to 2 times a week. The only way I can get it back is to unplug and plug it back in. The Echo is only 10 feet from my router. No other devices in my home have this problem. Including my Echo show. My 2 Echo Dots, and my echo spot. Seriously thinking of returning it.
Bought one for my room and my daughters room. Works great!

reviews.reviewTitle: As expected - but it is too small for my vision.
reviews.reviewText: I own the original Show and love it. I bought this for our porch (indoor) but unfortunately, I find the screen size too small to view comfortably. If your eyes are better than mine is should be a good addition for you.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love it!! Use it in the kitchen for recipes
reviews.reviewText: This is my 3rd Alexa...I have the Alexa, echo spot and echo show. Love them! I have the echo spot in the bedroom for the clock and the show in the kitchen mainly for recipes.

It's cute, it's nice to have the weather always showing, but I find I have to still ask my Google home questions I'm trying to answer.
Echo is good for games, simple things and fun... Not so much as a practical assistant

At the price offered it is a great device. Easy to pair and works well.
I like the smaller size. The screen is very easy to read and the colors are excellent. Also like the ability to cover the camera with the little slide cover.

I have been buying fire devices little by little for the house and this equipment could not be the exception. To give a voice command you can not be very far since it does not listen to you, for the rest I use it eventually since I usually use it as an alarm clock.

Overall very solid. Integration with my various switches, cameras, outlets was done in less than 15min for entire house. Less canned vendor options overall than Google, but the setup was quicker and easier. Haven't decided if I will replace Google overall or not yet... On the fence still.

Works well for the most part and at the price is certainly good enough for my use as a screen/audio vehicle for viewing alerts from the Ring Doorbell. Only down side with that is that it takes a few seconds to respond after I tell it to let me view the door.

I was a little surprised at the compact size. But it packs a punch. Works exactly as described and easy set up. Works great as a mini-entertainment center/alarm clock/video caller to use while traveling. One downside to this product is that unlike the full sized Show, this size does not support Hulu streaming. Does play Amazon video however. Perhaps the 2nd generation of this device will enable other streaming services. Sound quality is excellent for its compact size.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best alexa divice for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I own a bunch of differnt alexa products including the large show second gen. Out of all of them I like the show 5 the most because it's basically the exact same devices as the larger show but only for a fraction of the price! I ended up purchasing 2 at the full price on the release date and got 3 on Amazon Prime day for only $50 each. The sound was much better than I thought it was going to be and much louder too! Couldn't be happier with my purchases!

I love the Echo Show 5. It does so much more. Gives me recipes and song lyrics on the screen. Sometime we even breakout in Karaoke when Echo is playing a song. The screen is crisp and clear. I have even watch some of my Prime Videos on it while making dinner. Worth the money!

Had an Echo and replaced (moved the Echo to another location) it with a Show 5. One feature used extensively, setting timers. Now have to be very close to the Show for it to respond. Also don't like the speaker as much. The video feature is nice but for me, does not balance the loss of Far Field Voice and speaker quality.

The sound, the integration and the voice recognition are truly wonderful. Love it. Great technology in a compact and diverse Echo Show 5. Keep inventing and improving your product line, thanks Amazon.
It is an amazing product, compact and wonderful complement for a Smart home. Alexa works great in this device and the touch screen is so useful to control other devices (as ligths and cameras)
So much to learn about the many ways to use this. I'll be back later. Promise.

I love my Echo 5. I waited until Prime Day and she
(Echo 5) was worth the wait.
I love that you can play music and it really sounds great, sound clarity was so good cats jumped off the sofa..haha
Thanks again for such a great product
I really love this, but I really don't use that much yet. I thought it was starting to have problems because it went dim, so I unplugged it and restarted it and it seems fine now.

It was everything i expected. When Amazon or Google provide a true web browser,total internet experience,i would give it a 5.Of course just like cell phones you cant make the best product in one year,otherwise we wouldnt buy another product until its so outdated you have to. So for the price,camera lens cover and sound better then my sons spongebob clock I would recomend this.

By far my favorite bedside device. Alarm works well, ambient sounds (thunderstorm, fan, etc..) is a must have for me (sounds good too), fun to wake up and ask questions like weather, fun facts, horoscope. I'm digging the smart home basics

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice addition to the Echo line
reviews.reviewText: I think Amazon has hit on the perfect form factor for a screen-enabled Echo device. I particularly like the drop-in feature to wake my kids in the morning when they are not responding to the alarm. Overall a solid device at a good price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for waking up in the morning
reviews.reviewText: I love the Echo Show 5. I wanted something to play music as I get ready for the day. The lyric display makes singing along fantastic— and this is great for waking up. Also, asking Alexa what time it is keeps me on track. It is perfect for me!

reviews.reviewTitle: I just wish Alexa listened to me
reviews.reviewText: Having to repeat myself to turn on and off the lights, saying which song to play to hear "I don't know such and such song" only to have it work the 5th time I repeat the command. Playing songs I don't ask for. It is great for an alarm clock, which is why I bought it.
Switched to Alexa from Google and am satisfied 100%

reviews.reviewTitle: OK video device but does not integrate with other Echo devices
reviews.reviewText: The Echo Show is a reasonable device for video chats but the integration with other echo devices I could not get to work even after spending over an hour on the phone with an Amazon tech.
I love it! Being able to see friends and family is priceless!
I have an Echo small tower which has very good sound. The Echo Dot sound was so bad by comparison, I just gave it to my sister and kept my old Echo. So I cannot comment on any other features.

I had this devise set up in about five minutes. The sound quality of the speaker is great. The Alexa response is quick when I want to view my Ring cameras or listen to Prime music. I'm very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good, but still has lots of improving ground
reviews.reviewText: It doesn't recognize my voice and still has some flaws, but it works well for me to answer the door and do some basic tasks like turning on/off devices, play some music or set a timer.
Did not know what to expect but I am very pleased with the sound quality of the Echo Show. Very easy to set up and nice to see the a video screen that shows what is playing on the music requested.

This was a great price and I bought mainly for my "Ring" alarm system. It is great to ask Alexa to see my back yard or my from door and she shows me very quickly. I think the longer I have it the more I discover that I can do with it. defiantly worth the money.

reviews.reviewTitle: The speaker on this is very good and clear
reviews.reviewText: I like it it. the sound is very good and clear I won't to get two more for my friends for Christmas

It took me a long time before I decided to get one of these and so sorry I didn't do it sooner. The easiest alarm clock I have ever had....I just tell her what time in the morning I want to wake up and it happens (my wake time changes daily and it was tedious to reprogram my alarm clock everyday). The music sound is high quality and I use this every day.....LOVE IT!
Very littles to dislike. My wife fell in love with my echo spot, I gave it to her and replaced it with this, and it is terrific. It would be nice to be able to turn off the morning alarm manually.

reviews.reviewTitle: Doesnt work well with Blink (no video!)
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mainly to integrate with Blink cameras but it doesn't work well with it. I have both original blink and XT2 and neither display video in Echo 5(works fine in Blink app so I don't think it's my setup). It's Just displaying "Waiting for Blink" then gives up. Link/unlinked many times but no avail. Ive also read similar issues within in Blink Forum. Amazon has option to sell Echo5 and Blink as a package so you would expect that it'll seamlessly work!

reviews.reviewTitle: Small in size, not in features
reviews.reviewText:
The smaller brother to the full sized Echo Show. Great for smaller places like my dining room or bedroom.

Compliments my full sized Show which we have in the kitchen.

I do like this unit, but the microphone or actually its ability to hear a request or wake word is far to be desired. My echo dot in the other room with a closed door will some times wake up instead of the echo 5.

I purchased the Echo Show because it was marked as compatible with the Ring doorbell. But I'm disappointed that it won't display who is at my door until I ask it too. And by that time, the person is frequently gone. I would prefer it to display the doorbell camera every time motion is detected.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to setup and use, ads are a bummer.
reviews.reviewText: This could easily be a five star review, but the ads across the screen are ridiculous. I have the background set to scroll my photos which is nice, set-up was super easy and done with very input from me.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works great with Ring and Wyze cameras.
reviews.reviewText: Very convenient for monitoring my Ring and Wyze cameras. Also like the visual of an order when I ask alexa "where's my stuff" or show my notification when a delivery arrives. More yet to explore!

It's the best Information center, alarm clock, favorite music station playing, harrassing my teenager without leaving the room announcing the calendar of events, silly joke telling, Ring Alarm System & Camera companion I could have dreamed of! And I continue to find new task constantly that the Echo does to make life simpler.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice Alexa product for the price.
reviews.reviewText: This is basically just like the echo dot with a touchscreen. The sound quality is pretty decent considering how small this product is. It would be nice if YouTube was integrated into this device.
Love it! Love it! My very own personal assistant- reminds me of doctors appointments and records my grocery list! Plus plays my favorite radio station- whoohoo!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great substitute for traditional clock radio
reviews.reviewText: This was to replace my old Bose alarm clock with an echo dot plugged into it. Perfect low footprint solution for nightstand. I have 2 full size echo shows and this was the perfect bedroom device

It's a echo dot with a screen. With the show part it is limited. You can't add much of anything but amazon content. No netflix or a lot things I can put on my Cube. Nice try but why limit the thing like that?
Nice size and affordable price
Love this little thing! It not only plays music but does so much more. Recipes, facts, figures, calendar, sports scores. And I have only had it set up for a few hours! LOVE LOVE LOVE my purchas.

reviews.reviewTitle: Hey, you can tell Alexa to set an alarm for tmm Morning
reviews.reviewText: ...... it’s not a speaker to blast good music. I believe I use it for what it was intended for, and that’s a smart alarm clock. An alarm clock that has different abilities, like play my apple music, podcast, tell me score, weather, and something interesting. Most importantly it tells time. It will play music through its speaker and it’s built to be a nightstand speaker, not to blast and entertain for a party. I love my new Alexa product and I recommend it to anyone looking to just tell Alexa, “set an alarm for 5am”.
Bought this for our kitchen. Very handy for recipes and using it as a timer. Love the little interesting news story’s they show and best of all I’ve yet to see anything political pop up up! 😁
I have it bedside on my nightstand. I use the weather forecast each morning. I play music in th evening as I go to bed. I am enjoying it and learning more as time goes on.

reviews.reviewTitle: Give you lerics to your favorite songs
reviews.reviewText: Be able to trust it not picking up conversations or videoing
like the new form factor. The smaller design is great.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice display, good sound, fits well in the bedroom
reviews.reviewText: Echo Show 5 has fulfilled my expectations tied to a bedroom type device that I could use in place of my cell phone for alarms and checking the time throughout the night. Additionally the Alex voice enabled features tied to playing music in the morning has been awesome.
Alexa is awesome! She’s my virtual assistant!

Got these for my kids rooms and they are obsessed! It’s not overly user friendly for young kids (and sometimes older) but they can get by with what they know to do with her. Good price point for the product. Video is very clear. Drop in video and audio is great as well.

I bought this to put on my nightstand to use as an alarm but also to call my daughter and grandkids. It works great and now my mom wants one. I loaned her the echo dot to see if she would like this type of technology and she fell in love. She's 86 and does not fair well with technical items usually. This was easy for her to learn.

reviews.reviewTitle: I’m an Alexa junkie, and this device is a piece of junk
reviews.reviewText:
Save your money.

I have been using several Alexa devices for years. This is by far the worst. The microphones are a joke. I am constantly repeating myself to the point that it would be easier for me to get up and walk across the room and scream into my other Alexa device to get it to do anything.

Actually, a first generation Alexa dot routinely hears my commands from three rooms away sooner than this piece of junk does.
Easy set up. Used a min-Alexa name to help distinguish it from my other echoes.
Planning return

I needed a clock radio in my master bathroom to replace my old one from the 90's that finally died. I was so excited when I received my new Echo Show 5. It is the perfect size for a small area and looks so elegant compared to a bulky radio and you get all of the benefits of Alexa! What more could you ask for?!
Like a Karaoke machine, when you tell Alexa to play a song, it also shows the words on the screen. I bought this for looking up recipes in the kitchen, but now use for a lot more.

reviews.reviewTitle: Would buy again over and over.
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely the best alarm clock I've ever had. Love that it expanded Alexa capabilities to my bedroom. Definitely not the Echo Plus, but it's a great add on.

WOW best product for the price. NO question.
This Echo item delivers everything stated.

The only thing that could beat this is: an ap on my phone, that recognized my voice and did everything this Echo does.
New versions are usually more. This one is less, and the lowered price is no excuse. This will not work with an Amazon remote. It won't pair with current remotes. A deal breaker.
does what I wanted with limited problems setting up

reviews.reviewTitle: My third Echo Show, using this one as PC speakers too
reviews.reviewText: This Show is small enough so I wanted to use it as my PC speakers in my home office. Because there is no audio in jack on this device (which seems like something Amazon should correct!) I simply needed to buy a $7 USB Bluetooth adapter to connect it to my Win10 PC. The sound is very good for the size, it tucks in under my monitor with only the power wire visible, and I really like having the functionality of an Echo Show right on my desk!

Great device. Works as advertised. Works well with...
Wyze camera
August Locks
SimpliSafe
SmartLife plugs
merkury light bulbs

Have one in living room. Will put one in kitchen and bedroom when they go on sales.

Only problem is I'll have extra echo dots on hand
We like most of the features of the Echo 5. Good compromise on size, price and performance. When playing music we found the sound muffled regardless of "equalizer" sound settings.

Performs just like my Echo does but with a very useful display! And all I need do now is say; “Echo show front door.” And my screen show what my Arlo wireless camera is seeing. And it gives me news updates! I love everything about the Echo Show 5, especially the price! The sound quality is good but not as good as the Echo Plus (2nd Generation). Maximum volume is not as loud and the bass not as strong. All of that is understandable considering it’s size.

reviews.reviewTitle: A nice addition to our family.
reviews.reviewText: It helps me ck on my handicapped husband.

reviews.reviewTitle: It’s OK for the price. Better than a Dot.
reviews.reviewText: Liked everything but sound is muffled unlike the Echo Show and Echo Dots. I have played with the suggested adjustments but it is not a clear sound like the other devices.
I do love having this on my nightstand. The size is perfect. The sound is good and the screen is fine for my use. I would recommend this unit to anyone given it’s affordability.

reviews.reviewTitle: seems like technology I don’t need
